   22: %%
   23: %% ct:run("../inets_test", httpc_SUITE).
   24: %%
   25: 
   26: -module(httpc_SUITE).
   27: 
   28: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   29: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   30: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   31: -include("inets_test_lib.hrl").
   32: -include("http_internal.hrl").
   33: -include("httpc_internal.hrl").
   34: %% Note: This directive should only be used in test suites.
   35: -compile([export_all, nowarn_export_all]).
   36: 
   37: -define(URL_START, "http://").
   38: -define(TLS_URL_START, "https://").
   39: -define(NOT_IN_USE_PORT, 8997).
   40: -define(profile(Config), proplists:get_value(profile, Config, httpc:default_profile())).
   41: 
   42: -define(SSL_NO_VERIFY, {ssl, [{verify, verify_none}]}).
   43: 
   44: %% Using hardcoded file path to keep it below 107 characters
   45: %% (maximum length supported by erlang)
   46: -define(UNIX_SOCKET, "/tmp/inets_httpc_SUITE.sock").
   47: 
   48: -record(sslsocket, {fd = nil, pid = nil}).
   49: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   50: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   51: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   52: suite() ->
   53:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   54:      {timetrap,{seconds, 30}}
   55:     ].
   56: 
   57: all() ->
   58:     [
   59:      {group, http},
   60:      {group, http_ipv6},
   61:      {group, sim_http},
   62:      {group, sim_http_process_leak},
   63:      {group, sim_http_ipv6},
   64:      {group, http_internal},
   65:      {group, http_unix_socket},
   66:      {group, https},
   67:      {group, sim_https},
   68:      {group, misc},
   69:      {group, sim_mixed} % HTTP and HTTPS sim servers
   70:     ].
   71: 
   72: groups() ->
   73:     [
   74:      {http, [parallel], real_requests()},
   75:      {http_ipv6, [parallel], [request_options]},
   76:      {sim_http, [parallel], only_simulated() ++ server_closing_connection()},
   77:      {sim_http_process_leak, [process_leak_on_keepalive]},
   78:      {sim_http_ipv6, [parallel], only_simulated() ++ server_closing_connection()
   79:           % The following two tests are not functional on IPv6 yet:
   80:           % ++ [process_leak_on_keepalive]
   81:           -- [server_closing_connection_on_second_response]
   82:           },
   83:      {http_internal, [parallel], real_requests_esi()},
   84:      {http_internal_minimum_bytes, [parallel], [remote_socket_close_parallel]},
   85:      {http_unix_socket, [parallel], simulated_unix_socket()},
   86:      {https, [parallel], [def_ssl_opt | real_requests()]},
   87:      {sim_https, [parallel], only_simulated()},
   88:      {misc, [parallel], misc()},
   89:      {sim_mixed, [parallel], sim_mixed()}
   90:     ].
   91: 
   92: real_requests()->
   93:     [
   94:      head,
   95:      get,
   96:      get_query_string,
   97:      post,
   98:      delete,
   99:      post_stream,
  100:      patch,
  101:      async,
  102:      pipeline,
  103:      persistent_connection,
  104:      save_to_file,
  105:      save_to_file_async,
  106:      page_does_not_exist,
  107:      emulate_lower_versions,
  108:      headers,
  109:      headers_as_is,
  110:      header_type_0,
  111:      header_type_1,
  112:      header_type_2,
  113:      header_type_3,
  114:      header_type_4,
  115:      header_type_5,
  116:      header_type_6,
  117:      header_type_7,
  118:      header_type_8,
  119:      header_type_9,
  120:      header_type_10,
  121:      header_type_11,
  122:      header_type_12,
  123:      header_type_13,
  124:      header_type_14,
  125:      header_type_15,
  126:      header_type_16,
  127:      header_type_17,
  128:      header_type_18,
  129:      header_type_19,
  130:      header_type_20,
  131:      header_type_21,
  132:      header_type_22,
  133:      header_type_23,
  134:      empty_body,
  135:      stream,
  136:      stream_to_pid,
  137:      stream_through_fun,
  138:      stream_through_mfa,
  139:      streaming_error,
  140:      inet_opts,
  141:      invalid_headers,
  142:      invalid_headers_key,
  143:      invalid_headers_value,
  144:      invalid_body,
  145:      invalid_body_fun,
  146:      invalid_method,
  147:      no_scheme,
  148:      invalid_uri,
  149:      binary_url,
  150:      iolist_body
  151:     ].
  152: 
  153: real_requests_esi() ->
  154:     [slow_connection].
  155: 
  156: simulated_unix_socket() ->
  157:     [unix_domain_socket].
  158: 
  159: only_simulated() ->
  160:     [
  161:      cookie,
  162:      cookie_profile,
  163:      empty_set_cookie,
  164:      invalid_set_cookie,
  165:      trace,
  166:      stream_once,
  167:      stream_single_chunk,
  168:      stream_no_length,
  169:      not_streamed_once,
  170:      stream_large_not_200_or_206,
  171:      no_content_204,
  172:      tolerate_missing_CR,
  173:      userinfo,
  174:      bad_response,
  175:      timeout_redirect,
  176:      internal_server_error,
  177:      invalid_http,
  178:      invalid_chunk_size,
  179:      headers_dummy,
  180:      headers_with_obs_fold,
  181:      headers_conflict_chunked_with_length,
  182:      empty_response_header,
  183:      remote_socket_close,
  184:      remote_socket_close_async,
  185:      transfer_encoding,
  186:      transfer_encoding_identity,
  187:      redirect_loop,
  188:      redirect_moved_permanently,
  189:      redirect_multiple_choises,
  190:      redirect_found,
  191:      redirect_see_other,
  192:      redirect_temporary_redirect,
  193:      redirect_permanent_redirect,
  194:      redirect_relative_uri,
  195:      port_in_host_header,
  196:      redirect_port_in_host_header,
  197:      relaxed,
  198:      multipart_chunks,
  199:      get_space,
  200:      delete_no_body,
  201:      post_with_content_type,
  202:      stream_fun_server_close
  203:     ].
  204: 
  205: server_closing_connection() ->
  206:     [
  207:      server_closing_connection_on_first_response,
  208:      server_closing_connection_on_second_response
  209:     ].
  210: 
  211: misc() ->
  212:     [
  213:      server_does_not_exist,
  214:      timeout_memory_leak,
  215:      wait_for_whole_response,
  216:      post_204_chunked,
  217:      head_chunked_empty_body,
  218:      head_empty_body,
  219:      chunkify_fun
  220:     ].
  221: 
  222: sim_mixed() ->
  223:     [
  224:      redirect_http_to_https,
  225:      redirect_relative_different_port
  226:     ].
  227: 
  228: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  229: 
  230: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  231:     logger:set_primary_config(level, warning),
  232:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  233:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  234:     inets_test_lib:start_apps([inets]),
  235:     ServerRoot = filename:join(PrivDir, "server_root"),
  236:     DocRoot = filename:join(ServerRoot, "htdocs"),
  237:     setup_server_dirs(ServerRoot, DocRoot, DataDir),
  238:     [{server_root, ServerRoot}, {doc_root, DocRoot}  | Config].
  239: 
  240: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  241:     inets_test_lib:stop_apps([inets]),
  242:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  243:     inets_test_lib:del_dirs(PrivDir),
  244:     ok.
  245: 
  246: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  247: init_per_group(misc = Group, Config) ->
  248:     start_apps(Group),
  249:     Inet = inet_version(),
  250:     [{httpc_options, [{ipfamily, Inet}]} | Config];
  251: init_per_group(Group, Config0) when Group =:= sim_https; Group =:= https;
  252:                                     Group =:= sim_mixed ->
  253:     catch crypto:stop(),
  254:     try crypto:start() of
  255:         ok ->
  256:             start_apps(Group),
  257:             HttpcOptions = [{keep_alive_timeout, 50000}, {max_keep_alive_length, 5}],
  258:             [{httpc_options, HttpcOptions} | do_init_per_group(Group, Config0)]
  259:     catch
  260:         _:_ ->
  261:             {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  262:     end;
  263: init_per_group(http_unix_socket = Group, Config0) ->
  264:     case os:type() of
  265:         {win32,_} ->
  266:             {skip, "Unix Domain Sockets are not supported on Windows"};
  267:         _ ->
  268:             file:delete(?UNIX_SOCKET),
  269:             start_apps(Group),
  270:             Config = proplists:delete(port, Config0),
  271:             {Pid, Port, HttpcOpts} = server_start(Group, server_config(Group, Config)),
  272:             lists:append([{dummy_server_pid, Pid}, {port, Port}, {httpc_options, HttpcOpts}],
  273:                          Config)
  274:     end;
  275: init_per_group(Group, Config0) when Group == http_ipv6;
  276:                                     Group == sim_http_ipv6 ->
  277:     case is_ipv6_supported() of
  278:         true ->
  279:             start_apps(Group),
  280:             Config = proplists:delete(port, Config0),
  281:             Port = server_start(Group, server_config(Group, Config)),
  282:             [{port, Port}, {request_opts, [{socket_opts, [{ipfamily, inet6}]}]} | Config];
  283:         false ->
  284:             {skip, "Host does not support IPv6"}
  285:      end;
  286: init_per_group(Group, Config0) ->
  287:     start_apps(Group),
  288:     Config = proplists:delete(port, Config0),
  289:     Port = server_start(Group, server_config(Group, Config)),
  290:     [{port, Port} | Config].
  291: 
  292: end_per_group(_, _Config) ->
  293:     ok.
  294: 
  295: do_init_per_group(Group=sim_mixed, Config0) ->
  296:     % The mixed group uses two server ports (http and https), so we use
  297:     % different config names here.
  298:     Config1 = init_ssl(Config0),
  299:     Config2 = proplists:delete(http_port, proplists:delete(https_port, Config1)),
  300:     {HttpPort, HttpsPort} = server_start(Group, server_config(sim_https, Config2)),
  301:     [{http_port, HttpPort} | [{https_port, HttpsPort} | Config2]];
  302: do_init_per_group(Group, Config0) ->
  303:     Config1 =
  304:         case Group of
  305:             https ->
  306:                 init_ssl(Config0);
  307:             sim_https ->
  308:                 init_ssl(Config0);
  309:             _ ->
  310:                 Config0
  311:         end,
  312:     Config = proplists:delete(port, Config1),
  313:     Port = server_start(Group, server_config(Group, Config)),
  314:     [{port, Port} | Config].
  315: 
  316: init_ssl(Config) ->
  317:     ClientFileBase = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "client"]),
  318:     ServerFileBase = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "server"]),
  319:     GenCertData =
  320:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  321:                                         #{root => [{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)},
  322:                                                    {digest, sha256}],
  323:                                           intermediates => [[{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)},
  324:                                                              {digest, sha256}]],
  325:                                           peer => [{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)},
  326:                                                    {digest, sha256}]
  327:                                          },
  328:                                     client_chain =>
  329:                                         #{root => [{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)},
  330:                                                    {digest, sha256}],
  331:                                           intermediates => [[{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)},
  332:                                                              {digest, sha256}]],
  333:                                           peer => [{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)},{digest, sha256}]}}),
  334:     Conf = inets_test_lib:gen_pem_config_files(GenCertData, ClientFileBase, ServerFileBase),
  335:     [{ssl_conf, Conf} | Config].
  336: 
  337: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  338: init_per_testcase(Name, Config) when Name == pipeline; Name == persistent_connection ->
  339:     inets:start(httpc, [{profile, Name}]),
  340:     GivenOptions = proplists:get_value(httpc_options, Config, []),
  341:     ok = httpc:set_options([{pipeline_timeout, 50000},
  342:                             {max_pipeline_length, 3} | GivenOptions], Name),
  343: 
  344:     [{profile, Name} | Config];
  345: init_per_testcase(async, Config) ->
  346:     {ok,Pid} = inets:start(httpc, [{profile, async}], stand_alone),
  347:     [{httpc_pid, Pid} | Config];
  348: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  349:     {ok, _Pid} = inets:start(httpc, [{profile, Case}]),
  350:     GivenOptions = proplists:get_value(httpc_options, Config, []),
  351:     ok = httpc:set_options(GivenOptions, Case),
  352:     [{profile, Case} | Config].
  353: 
  354: end_per_testcase(Case, Config)
  355:   when Case == server_closing_connection_on_first_response;
  356:        Case == server_closing_connection_on_second_response ->
  357:     %% Test case uses at most one session.  Ensure no leftover
  358:     %% sessions left behind.
  359:     {_, Status} = proplists:lookup(tc_status, Config),
  360:     ShallCleanup = case Status of
  361:                        ok -> true;
  362:                        {failed, _} -> true;
  363:                        {skipped, _} -> false
  364:                    end,
  365:     if ShallCleanup =:= true ->
  366:             httpc:request(url(group_name(Config), "/just_close.html", Config), ?profile(Config)),
  367:             ok;
  368:        true ->
  369:             ct:log("Not cleaning up because test case status was ~p", [Status]),
  370:             ok
  371:     end,
  372:     inets:stop(httpc, ?config(profile, Config));
  373: end_per_testcase(async, Config) ->
  374:     Pid = proplists:get_value(httpc_pid, Config),
  375:     inets:stop(httpc, Pid);
  376: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  377:     inets:stop(httpc, ?config(profile, Config)).
  378: 
  379: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  380: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  381: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  382: head() ->
  383:     [{doc, "Test http head request against local server."}].
  384: 
  385: head(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  386:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
  387:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], []}} = httpc:request(head, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  388:                                                    [], ?profile(Config)).
  389: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  390: get() ->
  391:     [{doc, "Test http get request against local server"}].
  392: get(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  393:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
  394:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], Body = [_ | _]}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  395:                                                                [], ?profile(Config)),
  396: 
  397:     inets_test_lib:check_body(Body),
  398: 
  399:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], BinBody}} =  httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  400:                                                          [{body_format, binary}], ?profile(Config)),
  401:     true = is_binary(BinBody).
  402: 
  403: 
  404: get_query_string() ->
  405:     [{doc, "Test http get request with query string against local server"}].
  406: get_query_string(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  407:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html?foo=bar", Config), []},
  408:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], Body = [_ | _]}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  409:                                                                [], ?profile(Config)),
  410: 
  411:     inets_test_lib:check_body(Body).
  412: 
  413: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  414: get_space() ->
  415:     [{"Test http get request with '%20' in the path of the URL."}].
  416: get_space(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  417:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/space%20.html", Config), []},
  418:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  419:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], Body = [_ | _]}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  420:                                                                RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)),
  421: 
  422:     inets_test_lib:check_body(Body).
  423: 
  424: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  425: post() ->
  426:     [{doc, "Test http post request against local server. We do in this case "
  427:      "only care about the client side of the the post. The server "
  428:      "script will not actually use the post data."}, {timetrap, timer:seconds(30)}].
  429: post(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  430:     CGI = case os:type() of
  431: 	      {win32, _} ->
  432: 		  "/cgi-bin/cgi_echo.exe";
  433: 	      _ ->
  434: 		  "/cgi-bin/cgi_echo"
  435: 	  end,
  436: 
  437:      URL = url(group_name(Config), CGI, Config),
  438: 
  439:     %% Cgi-script expects the body length to be 100
  440:     Body = lists:duplicate(100, "1"),
  441: 
  442:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_ | _]}} =
  443: 	httpc:request(post, {URL, [{"expect","100-continue"}],
  444: 			     "text/plain", Body}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)),
  445: 
  446:     {ok, {{_,504,_}, [_ | _], []}} =
  447: 	httpc:request(post, {URL, [{"expect","100-continue"}],
  448: 			     "text/plain", "foobar"}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)).
  449: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  450: delete() ->
  451:     [{doc, "Test http delete request against local server. We do in this case "
  452:      "only care about the client side of the the delete. The server "
  453:      "script will not actually use the delete data."}, {timetrap, timer:seconds(30)}].
  454: delete(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  455:     CGI = case os:type() of
  456:           {win32, _} ->
  457:           "/cgi-bin/cgi_echo.exe";
  458:           _ ->
  459:           "/cgi-bin/cgi_echo"
  460:       end,
  461: 
  462:     URL  = url(group_name(Config), CGI, Config),
  463:     Body = lists:duplicate(100, "1"),
  464: 
  465:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_ | _]}} =
  466:     httpc:request(delete, {URL, [{"expect","100-continue"}],
  467:                  "text/plain", Body}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)),
  468: 
  469:     {ok, {{_,504,_}, [_ | _], []}} =
  470:     httpc:request(delete, {URL, [{"expect","100-continue"}],
  471:                  "text/plain", "foobar"}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)).
  472: 
  473: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  474: patch() ->
  475:     [{"Test http patch request against local server. We do in this case "
  476:      "only care about the client side of the the patch. The server "
  477:      "script will not actually use the patch data."}].
  478: patch(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  479:     CGI = case os:type() of
  480: 	      {win32, _} ->
  481: 		  "/cgi-bin/cgi_echo.exe";
  482: 	      _ ->
  483: 		  "/cgi-bin/cgi_echo"
  484: 	  end,
  485: 
  486:      URL = url(group_name(Config), CGI, Config),
  487: 
  488:     %% Cgi-script expects the body length to be 100
  489:     Body = lists:duplicate(100, "1"),
  490: 
  491:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_ | _]}} =
  492: 	httpc:request(patch, {URL, [{"expect","100-continue"}],
  493: 			     "text/plain", Body}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)).
  494: 
  495: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  496: post_stream() ->
  497:     [{doc, "Test streaming http post request against local server. "
  498:      "We only care about the client side of the the post. "
  499:      "The server script will not actually use the post data."}, {timetrap, timer:seconds(30)}].
  500: post_stream(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  501:     CGI = case os:type() of
  502: 	      {win32, _} ->
  503: 		  "/cgi-bin/cgi_echo.exe";
  504: 	      _ ->
  505: 		  "/cgi-bin/cgi_echo"
  506: 	  end,
  507: 
  508:      URL = url(group_name(Config), CGI, Config),
  509: 
  510:     %% Cgi-script expects the body length to be 100
  511:     BodyFun = fun(0) ->
  512: 		      eof;
  513: 		 (LenLeft) ->
  514: 		      {ok, lists:duplicate(10, "1"), LenLeft - 10}
  515: 	      end,
  516: 
  517:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_ | _]}} =
  518: 	httpc:request(post, {URL,
  519: 			     [{"expect", "100-continue"},
  520: 			      {"content-length", "100"}],
  521: 			     "text/plain", {BodyFun, 100}}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)),
  522: 
  523:     {ok, {{_,504,_}, [_ | _], []}} =
  524: 	httpc:request(post, {URL,
  525: 			     [{"expect", "100-continue"},
  526: 			      {"content-length", "10"}],
  527: 			     "text/plain", {BodyFun, 10}}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)).
  528: 
  529: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  530: trace() ->
  531:     [{doc, "Perform a TRACE request."}].
  532: trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  533:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/trace.html", Config), []},
  534:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  535:     case httpc:request(trace, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)) of
  536: 	{ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], "TRACE /trace.html" ++ _}} ->
  537: 	    ok;
  538: 	 Other ->
  539: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, Other})
  540:     end.  
  541: 
  542: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  543: 
  544: pipeline(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  545:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
  546:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)),
  547: 
  548:     %% Make sure pipeline session is registered
  549:     ct:sleep(4000),
  550:     keep_alive_requests(Request, pipeline).
  551: 
  552: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  553: 
  554: persistent_connection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  555:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
  556:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)),
  557: 
  558:     %% Make sure pipeline session is registered
  559:     ct:sleep(4000),
  560:     keep_alive_requests(Request, persistent_connection).
  561: 
  562: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  563: async() ->
  564:     [{doc, "Test an asynchrony http request."}].
  565: async(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  566:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
  567:     HttpcPid = proplists:get_value(httpc_pid, Config),
  568:     {ok, RequestId} =
  569: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}], ?profile(Config)),
  570:     Body =
  571: 	receive
  572: 	    {http, {RequestId, {{_, 200, _}, _, BinBody}}} ->
  573: 		BinBody;
  574: 	    {http, Msg} ->
  575: 		ct:fail(Msg)
  576: 	end,
  577:     inets_test_lib:check_body(binary_to_list(Body)),
  578: 
  579:     %% Check full result false option for async request
  580:     {ok, RequestId2} =
  581:         httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false},
  582:                                          {full_result, false}]),
  583:     Body2 =
  584:         receive
  585:             {http, {RequestId2, 200, BinBody2}} ->
  586:                 BinBody2;
  587:             {http, Msg2} ->
  588:                 ct:fail(Msg2)
  589:         end,
  590:     inets_test_lib:check_body(binary_to_list(Body2)),
  591: 
  592:     %% Check receiver alias() option for async request with stand_alone httpc
  593:     {ok, RequestId3} =
  594:         httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false},
  595:                                          {receiver, alias()}], HttpcPid),
  596:     Body3 =
  597:         receive
  598:             {http, {RequestId3, {{_, 200, _}, _, BinBody3}}} ->
  599:                 BinBody3;
  600:             {http, Msg3} ->
  601:                 ct:fail(Msg3)
  602:         end,
  603:     inets_test_lib:check_body(binary_to_list(Body3)),
  604:     {ok, NewRequestId} =
  605: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}]),
  606:     ok = httpc:cancel_request(NewRequestId).
  607: 
  608: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  609: save_to_file() ->
  610:     [{doc, "Test to save the http body to a file"}].
  611: save_to_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  612:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  613:     FilePath = filename:join(PrivDir, "dummy.html"),
  614:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
  615:     Request = {URL, []},
  616:     {ok, saved_to_file}
  617: 	= httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{stream, FilePath}], ?profile(Config)),
  618:     {ok, Bin} = file:read_file(FilePath),
  619:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], Body}} = httpc:request(URL, ?profile(Config)),
  620:     Bin == Body.
  621: 
  622: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  623: save_to_file_async() ->
  624:     [{doc,"Test to save the http body to a file"}].
  625: save_to_file_async(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  626:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  627:     FilePath = filename:join(PrivDir, "dummy.html"),
  628:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
  629:     Request = {URL, []},
  630:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
  631:     {ok, RequestId} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  632: 				    [{stream, FilePath},
  633: 				     {sync, false}], Profile),
  634:     receive
  635: 	{http, {RequestId, saved_to_file}} ->
  636: 	    ok;
  637: 	{http, Msg} ->
  638: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
  639:     end,
  640: 
  641:     {ok, Bin} = file:read_file(FilePath),
  642:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], Body}} = httpc:request(URL, Profile),
  643:     Bin == Body.
  644: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  645: stream() ->
  646:     [{doc, "Test the option stream for asynchrony requests"}].

  648:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
  649:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  650:     stream_test(Request, {stream, self}, RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)).
  651: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  652: stream_once() ->
  653:     [{doc, "Test the option stream for asynchrony requests"}].
  654: stream_once(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  655:     Request0  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
  656:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  657:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
  658:     stream_test(Request0, {stream, {self, once}}, RequestOpts, Profile),
  659: 
  660:     Request1  = {url(group_name(Config), "/once.html", Config), []},
  661:     stream_test(Request1, {stream, {self, once}}, RequestOpts, Profile),
  662: 
  663:     Request2  = {url(group_name(Config), "/once_chunked.html", Config), []},
  664:     stream_test(Request2, {stream, {self, once}}, RequestOpts, Profile).
  665: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------

  676: stream_no_length(Config) when is_list(Config) ->

  682:     stream_test(Request2, {stream, self}, RequestOpts, Profile).

  690:     {404, _} = not_streamed_test(Request, {stream, self}, RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)).
  691: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  692: not_streamed_once() ->
  693:     [{doc, "Test not streamed responses with once streaming"}].
  694: not_streamed_once(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  695:     Request0 = {url(group_name(Config), "/404.html", Config), []},
  696:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  697:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
  698:     {404, _} = not_streamed_test(Request0, {stream, {self, once}}, RequestOpts, Profile),
  699:     Request1 = {url(group_name(Config), "/404_chunked.html", Config), []},
  700:     {404, _} = not_streamed_test(Request1, {stream, {self, once}}, RequestOpts, Profile).

  703: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  704: redirect_multiple_choises() ->
  705:     [{doc, "The user agent, selection of the most appropriate choice MAY "
  706:       "be performed automatically."}].
  707: redirect_multiple_choises(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  708:     URL300 = url(group_name(Config), "/300.html", Config),
  709:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  710:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
  711: 
  712:     catch {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}}
  713: 	= httpc:request(get, {URL300, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
  714: 
  715:     {ok, {{_,300,_}, [_ | _], _}} =
  716: 	httpc:request(get, {URL300, []}, [{autoredirect, false},?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  717:                       RequestOpts, Profile).
  718: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  719: redirect_moved_permanently() ->
  720:     [{doc, "The server SHOULD generate a Location header field in the response "
  721:       "containing a preferred URI reference for the new permanent URI.  The user "
  722:       "agent MAY use the Location field value for automatic redirection.  The server's " 
  723:       "response payload usually contains a short hypertext note with a "
  724:       "hyperlink to the new URI(s)."}].
  725: redirect_moved_permanently(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  726: 
  727:     URL301 = url(group_name(Config), "/301.html", Config),
  728:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  729:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
  730: 
  731:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}}
  732: 	= httpc:request(get, {URL301, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
  733: 
  734:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], []}}
  735: 	= httpc:request(head, {URL301, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
  736: 
  737:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}}
  738: 	= httpc:request(post, {URL301, [],"text/plain", "foobar"},
  739: 			[?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile).
  740: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------

  860: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  861: redirect_http_to_https() ->
  862:     [{doc, "Test that a 30X redirect from one scheme to another is handled "
  863:       "correctly."}].
  864: redirect_http_to_https(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  865:     URL301 = mixed_url(http, "/301_custom_url.html", Config),
  866:     TargetUrl = mixed_url(https, "/dummy.html", Config),
  867:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  868:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
  869:     Headers = [{"x-test-301-url", TargetUrl}],
  870: 
  871:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}}
  872: 	= httpc:request(get, {URL301, Headers}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
  873: 
  874:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], []}}
  875: 	= httpc:request(head, {URL301, Headers}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
  876: 
  877:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}}
  878: 	= httpc:request(post, {URL301, Headers, "text/plain", "foobar"},
  879: 			[?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile).
  880: 
  881: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  882: redirect_relative_different_port() ->
  883:     [{doc, "Test that a 30X redirect with a relative target, but different "
  884:       "port, is handled correctly."}].
  885: redirect_relative_different_port(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  886:     URL301 = mixed_url(http, "/301_custom_url.html", Config),
  887:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  888:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
  889: 
  890:     % We need an extra server of the same protocol here, so spawn a new
  891:     % HTTP-protocol one
  892:     Port = server_start(sim_http, []),
  893:     {ok, Host} = inet:gethostname(),
  894:     % Prefix the URI with '/' instead of a scheme
  895:     TargetUrl = "//" ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/dummy.html",
  896:     Headers = [{"x-test-301-url", TargetUrl}],
  897: 
  898:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}}
  899: 	= httpc:request(get, {URL301, Headers}, [], RequestOpts, Profile),
  900: 
  901:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], []}}
  902: 	= httpc:request(head, {URL301, Headers}, [], RequestOpts, Profile),
  903: 
  904:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}}
  905: 	= httpc:request(post, {URL301, Headers, "text/plain", "foobar"},
  906: 			[], RequestOpts, Profile).
  907: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  908: cookie() ->
  909:     [{doc, "Test cookies on the default profile."}].
  910: cookie(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  911:     ok = httpc:set_options([{cookies, enabled}]),
  912: 
  913:     Request0 = {url(group_name(Config), "/cookie.html", Config), []},
  914:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  915: 
  916:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}}
  917: 	= httpc:request(get, Request0, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts),
  918: 
  919:     Request1 = {url(group_name(Config), "/", Config), []},
  920: 
  921:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}} = global:trans(
  922:         {cookies, verify},
  923:         fun() -> httpc:request(get, Request1, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts) end,
  924:         [node()],
  925:         100
  926:     ),
  927: 
  928:    [{session_cookies, [_|_]}] = httpc:which_cookies(httpc:default_profile()),
  929: 
  930:     ok = httpc:set_options([{cookies, disabled}]).
  931: 
  932: 
  933: 
  934: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  935: cookie_profile() ->
  936:     [{doc, "Test cookies on a non default profile."}].
  937: cookie_profile(Config) when is_list(Config) ->   
  938:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
  939:     ok = httpc:set_options([{cookies, enabled}], Profile),
  940: 
  941:     Request0 = {url(group_name(Config), "/cookie.html", Config), []},
  942:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  943: 
  944:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}}
  945: 	= httpc:request(get, Request0, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
  946: 
  947:     Request1 = {url(group_name(Config), "/", Config), []},
  948: 
  949:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}} = global:trans(
  950:         {cookies, verify},
  951:         fun() -> httpc:request(get, Request1, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile) end,
  952:         [node()],
  953:         100
  954:     ).
  955:

  985: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  986: headers_as_is() ->
  987:     [{doc, "Test the option headers_as_is"}].
  988: headers_as_is(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  989:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
  990:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  991:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
  992:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_|_], [_|_]}} =
  993: 	httpc:request(get, {URL, [{"Host", "localhost"},{"Te", ""}]},
  994: 		     [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{headers_as_is, true} | RequestOpts], Profile),
  995: 
  996:     {ok, {{_,400,_}, [_|_], [_|_]}} =
  997: 	httpc:request(get, {URL, [{"Te", ""}]},
  998:                       [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{headers_as_is, true} | RequestOpts], Profile).
  999: 
 1000: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1001: 
 1002: userinfo() ->
 1003:     [{doc, "Test user info e.i. http://user:passwd@host:port/"}].
 1004: userinfo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1005:     
 1006:     URLAuth = url(group_name(Config), "alladin%40example.com:sesame", "/userinfo.html", Config),
 1007:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1008:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1009: 
 1010:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], _}}
 1011: 	= httpc:request(get, {URLAuth, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
 1012: 
 1013:     URLUnAuth = url(group_name(Config), "alladin%40example.com:foobar", "/userinfo.html", Config),
 1014: 
 1015:     {ok, {{_,401, _}, [_ | _], _}} =
 1016: 	httpc:request(get, {URLUnAuth, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile).

 1030: streaming_error(doc) ->
 1031:     [{doc, "Only async requests can be streamed - Solves OTP-8056"}];
 1032: 
 1033: streaming_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1034:     Method      = get,
 1035:     Request     = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
 1036:     RequestOpts = [{sync, true} | proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, [])],
 1037:     Profile     = ?profile(Config),
 1038: 
 1039:     {error, streaming_error} = httpc:request(Method, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1040:                                              [{stream, {self, once}} | RequestOpts], Profile),
 1041: 
 1042:     {error, streaming_error} = httpc:request(Method, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1043:                                              [{stream, self} | RequestOpts], Profile).
 1044: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------

 1052: 				integer_to_list(?NOT_IN_USE_PORT)
 1053: 			    ++ "/", []},[?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)).

 1115: bad_response() ->
 1116:     [{doc, "Test what happens when the server does not follow the protocol"}].
 1117: 
 1118: bad_response(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1119: 
 1120:     URL0 = url(group_name(Config), "/missing_crlf.html", Config),
 1121:     URL1 = url(group_name(Config), "/wrong_statusline.html", Config),
 1122:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1123:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1124: 
 1125:     Response = httpc:request(get, {URL0, []}, [{timeout, 400},?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1126:                              RequestOpts, Profile),
 1127:     true = is_timeout_response(Response),
 1128:     ct:log("First response: ~p~n", [Response]),
 1129:     {error, Reason} = httpc:request(get, {URL1, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1130:                                     RequestOpts, Profile),
 1131: 
 1132:     ct:log("Wrong Statusline: ~p~n", [Reason]).
 1133: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------

 1139:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1140:     Response = httpc:request(get, {URL, []}, [{timeout, 400},?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1141:                              RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)),
 1142:     ct:log("Timeout response: ~p~n", [Response]),
 1143:     true = is_timeout_response(Response).

 1148: internal_server_error() ->
 1149:     [{doc, "Test 50X codes"}].
 1150: internal_server_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1151: 
 1152:     URL500 = url(group_name(Config), "/500.html", Config),
 1153:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1154:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1155: 
 1156:     {ok, {{_,500,_}, [_ | _], _}}
 1157: 	= httpc:request(get, {URL500, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
 1158: 
 1159:     URL503 = url(group_name(Config), "/503.html", Config),
 1160: 
 1161:     %% Used to be able to make the service available after retry.
 1162:     ets:new(unavailable, [named_table, public, set]),
 1163:     ets:insert(unavailable, {503, unavailable}),
 1164: 
 1165:     {ok, {{_,200, _}, [_ | _], [_|_]}} =
 1166: 	httpc:request(get, {URL503, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
 1167: 
 1168:     ets:insert(unavailable, {503, long_unavailable}),
 1169: 
 1170:     {ok, {{_,503, _}, [_ | _], [_|_]}} =
 1171: 	httpc:request(get, {URL503, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
 1172: 
 1173:     ets:delete(unavailable).

 1215:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1216:

 1218: 	httpc:request(get, {URL, []}, [{version, "HTTP/1.0"}, ?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1219:                       RequestOpts, Profile),
 1220:     inets_test_lib:check_body(Body1),
 1221:     {ok, {{"HTTP/1.1", 200, _}, [_ | _], Body2 = [_ | _]}} =
 1222: 	httpc:request(get, {URL, []}, [{version, "HTTP/1.1"}, ?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1223:                       RequestOpts, Profile),

 1247: 
 1248: headers() ->
 1249:     [{doc,"Use as many request headers as possible not used in proxy_headers"}].
 1250: headers(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1251: 
 1252:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
 1253:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1254:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1255:     DocRoot = proplists:get_value(doc_root, Config),
 1256: 
 1257:     {ok, FileInfo} =
 1258: 	file:read_file_info(filename:join([DocRoot,"dummy.html"])),
 1259:     CreatedSec =
 1260: 	calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(
 1261: 	  FileInfo#file_info.mtime),
 1262: 
 1263:     Mod = httpd_util:rfc1123_date(
 1264: 	    calendar:gregorian_seconds_to_datetime(
 1265: 	      CreatedSec-1)),
 1266: 
 1267:     Date = httpd_util:rfc1123_date({date(), time()}),
 1268: 
 1269:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_ | _]}} =
 1270: 	httpc:request(get, {URL, [{"If-Modified-Since",
 1271: 				   Mod},
 1272: 				  {"From","webmaster@erlang.se"},
 1273: 				  {"Date", Date}
 1274: 				 ]}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
 1275: 
 1276:     Mod1 =  httpd_util:rfc1123_date(
 1277: 	      calendar:gregorian_seconds_to_datetime(
 1278: 		CreatedSec+1)),
 1279: 
 1280:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_ | _]}} =
 1281: 	httpc:request(get, {URL, [{"If-UnModified-Since",
 1282: 				   Mod1}
 1283: 				 ]}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
 1284: 
 1285:     Tag = httpd_util:create_etag(FileInfo),
 1286: 
 1287: 
 1288:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_ | _]}} =
 1289: 	httpc:request(get, {URL, [{"If-Match",
 1290: 				   Tag}
 1291: 				 ]}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
 1292: 
 1293:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], _}} =
 1294: 	httpc:request(get, {URL, [{"If-None-Match",
 1295: 				   "NotEtag,NeihterEtag"},
 1296: 				  {"Connection", "Close"}
 1297: 				 ]}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile).
 1298: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1299: headers_dummy() ->
 1300:     ["Test the code for handling headers we do not want/can send "
 1301:      "to a real server. Note it is not logical to send"
 1302:      "all of these headers together, we only want to test that"
 1303:      "the code for handling headers will not crash."].
 1304: 
 1305: headers_dummy(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1306: 
 1307:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/dummy_headers.html", Config),
 1308:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1309: 
 1310:     Foo = http_chunk:encode("foobar") ++
 1311: 	binary_to_list(http_chunk:encode_last()),
 1312:     FooBar =  Foo ++ "\r\n\r\nOther:inets_test\r\n\r\n",
 1313: 
 1314:     UserPasswd = base64:encode_to_string("Alladin:Sesame"),
 1315:     Auth = "Basic " ++ UserPasswd,
 1316: 
 1317:     %% The dummy server will ignore the headers, we only want to test
 1318:     %% that the client header-handling code. This would not
 1319:     %% be a valid http-request!
 1320:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}} =
 1321: 	httpc:request(post,
 1322: 		     {URL,
 1323: 		      [{"Via",
 1324: 			"1.0 fred, 1.1 nowhere.com (Apache/1.1)"},
 1325: 		       {"Warning","1#pseudonym foobar"},
 1326: 		       {"Vary","*"},
 1327: 		       {"Upgrade","HTTP/2.0"},
 1328: 		       {"Pragma", "1#no-cache"},
 1329: 		       {"Cache-Control", "no-cache"},
 1330: 		       {"Connection", "close"},
 1331: 		       {"Date", "Sat, 29 Oct 1994 19:43:31 GMT"},
 1332: 		       {"Accept", " text/plain; q=0.5, text/html"},
 1333: 		       {"Accept-Language", "en"},
 1334: 		       {"Accept-Encoding","chunked"},
 1335: 		       {"Accept-Charset", "ISO8859-1"},
 1336: 		       {"Authorization", Auth},
 1337: 		       {"Expect", "1#100-continue"},
 1338: 		       {"User-Agent","inets"},
 1339: 		       {"Transfer-Encoding","chunked"},
 1340: 		       {"Range", " bytes=0-499"},
 1341: 		       {"If-Range", "Sat, 29 Oct 1994 19:43:31 GMT"},
 1342: 		       {"If-Match", "*"},
 1343: 		       {"Content-Type", "text/plain"},
 1344: 		       {"Content-Length", "6"},
 1345: 		       {"Content-Language", "en"},
 1346: 		       {"Content-Location", "http://www.foobar.se"},
 1347: 		       {"Content-MD5",
 1348: 			"104528739076276072743283077410617235478"},
 1349: 		       {"Content-Range", "bytes 0-499/1234"},
 1350: 		       {"Allow", "GET"},
 1351: 		       {"Proxy-Authorization", Auth},
 1352: 		       {"Expires", "Sat, 29 Oct 1994 19:43:31 GMT"},
 1353: 		       {"Upgrade", "HTTP/2.0"},
 1354: 		       {"Last-Modified", "Sat, 29 Oct 1994 19:43:31 GMT"},
 1355: 		       {"Trailer","1#User-Agent"}
 1356: 		      ], "text/plain", FooBar},
 1357: 		     [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)).
 1358: 
 1359: 
 1360: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------

 1365:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, Headers, [_|_]}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1366:                                                       RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)),
 1367:     "a b" = proplists:get_value("folded", Headers).

 1371: headers_conflict_chunked_with_length() ->
 1372:     [{doc, "Test the code for handling headers with both Transfer-Encoding"
 1373:      "and Content-Length which must receive error in default (not relaxed) mode"
 1374:      "and must receive successful response in relaxed mode"}].
 1375: headers_conflict_chunked_with_length(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1376:     Request = {url(group_name(Config), "/headers_conflict_chunked_with_length.html", Config), []},
 1377:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1378:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1379:     {error, {could_not_parse_as_http, _}} = httpc:request(get, Request,
 1380:                                                           [{relaxed, false},?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1381:                                                           RequestOpts, Profile),
 1382:     {ok,{{_,200,_},_,_}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [{relaxed, true}, ?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1383:                                          RequestOpts, Profile),
 1384:     ok.

 1386: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1387: invalid_headers() ->
 1388:     [{doc, "Test invalid header format"}].
 1389: invalid_headers(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1390:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
 1391:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1392:     {error,{invalid_header,{"headers",
 1393:                             [{"user-agent","httpc"}]}}}	=
 1394:         httpc:request(get, {URL, [{"headers", [{"user-agent", "httpc"}]}]},
 1395:                                   [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)).
 1396: 
 1397: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1398: invalid_headers_key(Config) ->
 1399:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
 1400:                 [{cookie, "valid cookie"}]},
 1401:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1402:     {error, {headers_error, invalid_field}} =
 1403:         httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)).
 1404: 
 1405: invalid_headers_value(Config) ->
 1406:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
 1407:                 [{"cookie", atom_value}]},
 1408:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1409:     {error, {headers_error, invalid_value}} =
 1410:         httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)).
 1411: 
 1412: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1413: 
 1414: %% Doc not generated, but we can live without that.  It should be
 1415: %%  [{doc, "Header type test"}].
 1416: -define(HDR_TYPE_TEST(Name, Method, Value),
 1417:         Name(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1418:             test_header_type(Config, Method, Value)).
 1419: 
 1420: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_0, get, "stringheader").
 1421: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_1, get, <<"binary">>).
 1422: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_2, get, ["an", <<"iolist">>]).
 1423: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_3, head, "stringheader").
 1424: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_4, head, <<"binary">>).
 1425: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_5, head, ["an", <<"iolist">>]).
 1426: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_6, post, "stringheader").
 1427: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_7, post, <<"binary">>).
 1428: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_8, post, ["an", <<"iolist">>]).
 1429: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_9, put, "stringheader").
 1430: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_10, put, <<"binary">>).
 1431: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_11, put, ["an", <<"iolist">>]).
 1432: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_12, delete, "stringheader").
 1433: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_13, delete, <<"binary">>).
 1434: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_14, delete, ["an", <<"iolist">>]).
 1435: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_15, trace, "stringheader").
 1436: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_16, trace, <<"binary">>).
 1437: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_17, trace, ["an", <<"iolist">>]).
 1438: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_18, patch, "stringheader").
 1439: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_19, patch, <<"binary">>).
 1440: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_20, patch, ["an", <<"iolist">>]).
 1441: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_21, options, "stringheader").
 1442: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_22, options, <<"binary">>).
 1443: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_23, options, ["an", <<"iolist">>]).
 1444: 
 1445: test_header_type(Config, Method, Value) ->
 1446:     {Method, Value, {ok, _Data}} =
 1447:         {Method, Value,
 1448:          httpc:request(Method,
 1449:                       make_request(Config, Method, Value),
 1450:                       [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1451:                       [], ?profile(Config))}.
 1452: 
 1453: make_request(Config, Method, Value) ->
 1454:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
 1455:     Headers = [{"other-header", Value},
 1456:                {"user-agent", Value}],
 1457:     %% Generate request with or without body, depending on method.
 1458:     case method_type(Method) of
 1459:         read ->
 1460:             {URL, Headers};
 1461:         write ->
 1462:             {URL, Headers, "text/plain", ""}
 1463:     end.
 1464: 
 1465: method_type(Method) ->
 1466:     case Method of
 1467:         get -> read;
 1468:         head -> read;
 1469:         options -> read;
 1470:         trace -> read;
 1471:         post -> write;
 1472:         put -> write;
 1473:         delete -> write;
 1474:         patch -> write
 1475:     end.
 1476: 
 1477: is_timeout_response({error, timeout}) -> true;
 1478: is_timeout_response({error, {failed_connect, [{to_address, {_Host, _Port}},
 1479:                                               {Proto, [Proto], timeout}]}}) -> true;
 1480: is_timeout_response(_Response) -> false.
 1481: 
 1482: 
 1483: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1484: 
 1485: invalid_body(Config) ->
 1486:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
 1487:     {error, invalid_request} =
 1488:         httpc:request(post, {URL, [], <<"text/plain">>, "foobar"},
 1489:                       [], []).
 1490: 
 1491: invalid_body_fun(Config) ->
 1492:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
 1493:     BodyFun = fun() -> body_part end,
 1494:     {error, {bad_body_generator, _}} =
 1495:         httpc:request(post, {URL, [], "text/plain", {BodyFun, init}},
 1496:                       [], []).
 1497: 
 1498: 
 1499: invalid_method(Config) ->
 1500:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
 1501:     {error, invalid_method} =
 1502:         httpc:request(past, {URL, [], <<"text/plain">>, "foobar"},
 1503:                       [], []).
 1504: 
 1505: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1506: 
 1507: binary_url(Config) ->
 1508:     URL = uri_string:normalize(url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config)),
 1509:     case group_name(Config) of
 1510:         https -> ok;
 1511:         _ -> {ok, _Response} = httpc:request(unicode:characters_to_binary(URL), ?profile(Config))
 1512:     end.
 1513: 
 1514: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1515: 
 1516: iolist_body(Config) ->
 1517:     {ok, ListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active,once}, binary]),
 1518:     {ok,{_,Port}} = inet:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1519: 
 1520:     ProcessHeaders = 
 1521:         fun 
 1522:             F([], Acc) ->
 1523:                 Acc;
 1524:             F([Line|Tail], Acc0) ->
 1525:                 Acc1 = 
 1526:                     case binary:split(Line, <<": ">>, [trim_all]) of
 1527:                         [Key, Value] ->
 1528:                             Acc0#{Key => Value};
 1529:                         _ ->
 1530:                             Acc0
 1531:                     end,
 1532:                 F(Tail, Acc1)
 1533:         end,
 1534:     
 1535:     proc_lib:spawn(fun() ->
 1536:         {ok, Accept} = gen_tcp:accept(ListenSocket),
 1537:         receive
 1538:             {tcp, Accept, Msg} ->
 1539:                 ct:log("Message received: ~p", [Msg]),
 1540:                 [_HeadLine | HeaderLines] = binary:split(Msg, <<"\r\n">>, [global]),
 1541:                 Headers = ProcessHeaders(HeaderLines, #{}),
 1542:                 ContentLength = maps:get(<<"content-length">>, Headers, "-1"),
 1543:                 gen_tcp:send(Accept, [
 1544:                     "HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n",
 1545:                     "\r\n",
 1546:                     ContentLength
 1547:                 ])
 1548:         after
 1549:             1000 ->
 1550:                 ct:fail("Timeout: did not receive packet")
 1551:         end
 1552:     end),
 1553: 
 1554:     {ok, Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1555:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port),
 1556:     ReqBody = [
 1557:         <<"abc">>,
 1558:         <<"def">>
 1559:     ],
 1560:     {ok, Resp} = httpc:request(post, {URL, _Headers = [], _ContentType = "text/plain", ReqBody},
 1561:                                [], [], ?profile(Config)),
 1562:     ct:log("Got response ~p", [Resp]),
 1563:     case Resp of
 1564:         {{"HTTP/1.1", 200, "OK"}, [], RespBody} ->
 1565:             ReqBody_ContentLength = list_to_integer([C || C <- RespBody, C =/= $\s]),
 1566:             ?assertEqual(iolist_size(ReqBody), ReqBody_ContentLength);
 1567:         _ ->
 1568:             ct:fail("Didn't receive the correct response")
 1569:     end.
 1570: 
 1571: 
 1572: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1573: 
 1574: no_scheme(_Config) ->
 1575:     {error,{bad_scheme,"ftp"}} = httpc:request("ftp://foobar"),
 1576:     {error,{no_scheme}} = httpc:request("//foobar"),
 1577:     {error,{no_scheme}} = httpc:request("foobar"),
 1578:     ok.
 1579: 
 1580: 
 1581: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1582: 
 1583: invalid_uri(Config) ->
 1584:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/bar?x[]=a", Config),
 1585:     {error, invalid_uri} = httpc:request(URL),
 1586:     ok.
 1587: 
 1588: 
 1589: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1590: remote_socket_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1591:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/just_close.html", Config),
 1592:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1593:     {error, socket_closed_remotely} = httpc:request(get, {URL, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1594:                                                     RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)).
 1595: 
 1596: 
 1597: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1598: 
 1599: remote_socket_close_async(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1600:     Request = {url(group_name(Config), "/just_close.html", Config), []},
 1601:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1602:     Options     = [{sync, false} | RequestOpts],
 1603:     {ok, RequestId} =
 1604: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], Options, ?profile(Config)),
 1605:     receive
 1606: 	{http, {RequestId, {error, socket_closed_remotely}}} ->
 1607: 	    ok
 1608:     end.
 1609: 
 1610: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1611: 
 1612: process_leak_on_keepalive(Config) ->
 1613:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
 1614:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1615:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1616:     HttpcHandlers0 = supervisor:which_children(httpc_handler_sup),
 1617:     {ok, {{_, 200, _}, _, Body}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [], RequestOpts, Profile),
 1618:     HttpcHandlers1 = supervisor:which_children(httpc_handler_sup),
 1619:     ChildrenCount = supervisor:count_children(httpc_handler_sup),
 1620:     %% Assuming that the new handler will be selected for keep_alive
 1621:     %% which could not be the case if other handlers existed
 1622:     [{undefined, Pid, worker, [httpc_handler]}] =
 1623:         ordsets:to_list(
 1624:           ordsets:subtract(ordsets:from_list(HttpcHandlers1),
 1625:                            ordsets:from_list(HttpcHandlers0))),
 1626:     State = sys:get_state(Pid),
 1627:     #session{socket=Socket} = element(3, State),
 1628:     gen_tcp:close(Socket),
 1629: 
 1630:     {ok, {{_, 200, _}, _, Body}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [], RequestOpts, Profile),
 1631:     %% bad handler with the closed socket should get replaced by
 1632:     %% the new one, so children count should stay the same
 1633:     ChildrenCount = supervisor:count_children(httpc_handler_sup),
 1634:     ok.
 1635: 
 1636: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1637: 
 1638: stream_to_pid(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1639:     ReceiverPid = create_receiver(pid),
 1640:     Receiver    = ReceiverPid,
 1641: 
 1642:     stream(ReceiverPid, Receiver, Config),
 1643: 
 1644:     stop_receiver(ReceiverPid).
 1645: 
 1646: stream_through_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1647:     ReceiverPid = create_receiver(function),
 1648:     Receiver = stream_deliver_fun(ReceiverPid),
 1649: 
 1650:     stream(ReceiverPid, Receiver, Config),
 1651: 
 1652:     stop_receiver(ReceiverPid).
 1653: 
 1654: stream_through_mfa(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1655:     ReceiverPid = create_receiver(mfa),
 1656:     Receiver    = {?MODULE, stream_deliver, [mfa, ReceiverPid]},
 1657: 
 1658:     stream(ReceiverPid, Receiver, Config).
 1659: 
 1660: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1661: 
 1662: inet_opts(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1663:     MaxSessions      = 5,
 1664:     MaxKeepAlive     = 10,
 1665:     KeepAliveTimeout = timer:minutes(2),
 1666:     ConnOptions = [{max_sessions,          MaxSessions},
 1667: 		   {max_keep_alive_length, MaxKeepAlive},
 1668: 		   {keep_alive_timeout,    KeepAliveTimeout}],
 1669:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1670:     ok = httpc:set_options(ConnOptions, Profile),
 1671: 
 1672:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
 1673:     Timeout      = timer:seconds(5),
 1674:     ConnTimeout  = Timeout + timer:seconds(5),
 1675:     HttpOptions = [{timeout, Timeout}, {connect_timeout, ConnTimeout}, ?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1676:     Options0     = [{socket_opts, [{tos,    87},
 1677: 				   {recbuf, 16#FFFF},
 1678: 				   {sndbuf, 16#FFFF}]}],
 1679: 
 1680:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], ReplyBody0 = [_ | _]}} = httpc:request(get, Request, HttpOptions,
 1681:                                                                      Options0, Profile),
 1682:     inets_test_lib:check_body(ReplyBody0),
 1683: 
 1684:     Options1 = [{socket_opts, [{tos,    84},
 1685: 			       {recbuf, 32#1FFFF},
 1686: 			       {sndbuf, 32#1FFFF}]}],
 1687:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], ReplyBody1 = [_ | _]}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1688:                                                                      Options1, Profile),
 1689:     inets_test_lib:check_body(ReplyBody1).
 1690:

 1695:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1696:     {ok, {{_, 200, _}, _, Body}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1697:                                                  RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)),
 1698:     inets_test_lib:check_body(Body).

 1709: multipart_chunks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1710:     Request = {url(group_name(Config), "/multipart_chunks.html", Config), []},
 1711:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1712:     {ok, Ref} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1713:                               [{sync, false}, {stream, self} | RequestOpts], ?profile(Config)),
 1714:     ok = receive_stream_n(Ref, 10),
 1715:     httpc:cancel_request(Ref).
 1716:     
 1717: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1718: timeout_memory_leak() ->
 1719:     [{doc, "Check OTP-8739"}].
 1720: timeout_memory_leak(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1721:     {_DummyServerPid, Port} = otp_8739_dummy_server(),
 1722:     {ok, Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1723:     Request = {?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/dummy.html", []},
 1724:     Profile = ?config(profile, Config),
 1725:     WaitForCancelRequestToFinish =
 1726:         fun F(Handlers = [_ | _]) when is_list(Handlers) -> ct:fail({unexpected_handlers, Handlers});
 1727:             F(Handlers) when is_list(Handlers) -> ok;
 1728:             F(N) when is_integer(N) ->
 1729:                 Info = httpc:info(Profile),
 1730:                 ct:log("Info: ~p", [Info]),
 1731:                 {value, {handlers, Handlers}} =
 1732:                     lists:keysearch(handlers, 1, Info),
 1733:                 case Handlers of
 1734:                     [] ->
 1735:                         ok;
 1736:                     _ ->
 1737:                         ct:sleep(1)
 1738:                 end,
 1739:                 case N of
 1740:                     0 ->
 1741:                         F(Handlers);
 1742:                     _ ->
 1743:                         F(N-1)
 1744:                 end
 1745:         end,
 1746:     case httpc:request(get, Request, [{connect_timeout, 500}, {timeout, 1}], [{sync, true}], Profile) of
 1747: 	{error, timeout} ->
 1748:        WaitForCancelRequestToFinish(5);
 1749: 	Unexpected ->
 1750: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, Unexpected})
 1751:     end.
 1752: 
 1753: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1754: 
 1755: wait_for_whole_response() ->
 1756:     [{doc, "Check OTP-8154"}, {timetrap, timer:minutes(3)}].
 1757: wait_for_whole_response(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1758: 
 1759:      ReqSeqNumServer = start_sequence_number_server(),
 1760:      RespSeqNumServer = start_sequence_number_server(),
 1761:      {ok, Server, Port} = start_slow_server(RespSeqNumServer),
 1762:      Clients = run_clients(105, Port, ReqSeqNumServer),
 1763:      ok = wait4clients(Clients, timer:minutes(3)),
 1764:      Server ! shutdown,
 1765:      RespSeqNumServer ! shutdown,
 1766:      ReqSeqNumServer ! shutdown.
 1767: 
 1768: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1769: post_204_chunked() ->
 1770:     [{doc,"Test that chunked encoded 204 responses do not freeze the http client"}].
 1771: post_204_chunked(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1772:     Msg = "HTTP/1.1 204 No Content\r\n" ++
 1773:         "Date: Thu, 23 Aug 2018 13:36:29 GMT\r\n" ++
 1774:         "Content-Type: text/html\r\n" ++
 1775:         "Server: inets/6.5.2.3\r\n" ++
 1776:         "Cache-Control: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1777:         "Pragma: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1778:         "Expires: Fri, 24 Aug 2018 07:49:35 GMT\r\n" ++
 1779:         "Transfer-Encoding: chunked\r\n" ++
 1780:         "\r\n",
 1781:     Chunk = "0\r\n\r\n",
 1782: 
 1783:     {ok, ListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active,once}, binary]),
 1784:     {ok,{_,Port}} = inet:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1785:     spawn(fun () -> custom_server(Msg, Chunk, ListenSocket,
 1786:                                   fun custom_receive/0) end),
 1787: 
 1788:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1789:     End = "/cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:post_204",
 1790:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End,
 1791:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1792:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(post, {URL, [], "text/html", []}, [], [], Profile),
 1793:     timer:sleep(500),
 1794:     %% Second request times out in the faulty case.
 1795:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(post, {URL, [], "text/html", []}, [], [], Profile).
 1796: 
 1797: custom_receive() ->
 1798:     receive
 1799:         {tcp, _, Msg} ->
 1800:             ct:log("Message received: ~p", [Msg])
 1801:     after
 1802:         1000 ->
 1803:             ct:fail("Timeout: did not receive packet")
 1804:     end.
 1805: 
 1806: %% Custom server is used to test special cases when using chunked encoding
 1807: custom_server(Msg, Chunk, ListenSocket, ReceiveFun) ->
 1808:     {ok, Accept} = gen_tcp:accept(ListenSocket),
 1809:     ReceiveFun(),
 1810:     send_response(Msg, Chunk, Accept),
 1811:     custom_server_loop(Msg, Chunk, Accept, ReceiveFun).
 1812: 
 1813: custom_server_loop(Msg, Chunk, Accept, ReceiveFun) ->
 1814:     ReceiveFun(),
 1815:     send_response(Msg, Chunk, Accept),
 1816:     custom_server_loop(Msg, Chunk, Accept, ReceiveFun).
 1817: 
 1818: send_response(Msg, Chunk, Socket) ->
 1819:     inet:setopts(Socket, [{active, once}]),
 1820:     gen_tcp:send(Socket, Msg),
 1821:     timer:sleep(250),
 1822:     gen_tcp:send(Socket, Chunk).
 1823: 
 1824: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1825: head_chunked_empty_body() ->
 1826:     [{doc,"Test that HTTP responses (to HEAD requests) with 'Transfer-Encoding: chunked' and empty chunked-encoded body do not freeze the http client"}].
 1827: head_chunked_empty_body(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1828:     Msg = "HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden\r\n" ++
 1829:         "Date: Thu, 23 Aug 2018 13:36:29 GMT\r\n" ++
 1830:         "Content-Type: text/html\r\n" ++
 1831:         "Server: inets/6.5.2.3\r\n" ++
 1832:         "Cache-Control: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1833:         "Pragma: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1834:         "Expires: Fri, 24 Aug 2018 07:49:35 GMT\r\n" ++
 1835:         "Transfer-Encoding: chunked\r\n" ++
 1836:         "\r\n",
 1837:     Chunk = "0\r\n\r\n",
 1838: 
 1839:     {ok, ListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active,once}, binary]),
 1840:     {ok,{_,Port}} = inet:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1841:     spawn(fun () -> custom_server(Msg, Chunk, ListenSocket,
 1842:                                   fun custom_receive/0) end),
 1843:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1844:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port),
 1845:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1846:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(head, {URL, []}, [], [], Profile),
 1847:     timer:sleep(500),
 1848:     %% Second request times out in the faulty case.
 1849:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(head, {URL, []}, [], [], Profile).
 1850: 
 1851: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1852: head_empty_body() ->
 1853:     [{doc,"Test that HTTP responses (to HEAD requests) with 'Transfer-Encoding: chunked' and empty body do not freeze the http client"}].
 1854: head_empty_body(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1855:     Msg = "HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden\r\n" ++
 1856:         "Date: Thu, 23 Aug 2018 13:36:29 GMT\r\n" ++
 1857:         "Content-Type: text/html\r\n" ++
 1858:         "Server: inets/6.5.2.3\r\n" ++
 1859:         "Cache-Control: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1860:         "Pragma: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1861:         "Expires: Fri, 24 Aug 2018 07:49:35 GMT\r\n" ++
 1862:         "Transfer-Encoding: chunked\r\n" ++
 1863:         "\r\n",
 1864:     NoChunk = "", %% Do not chunk encode!
 1865: 
 1866:     {ok, ListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active,once}, binary]),
 1867:     {ok,{_,Port}} = inet:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1868:     spawn(fun () -> custom_server(Msg, NoChunk, ListenSocket,
 1869:                                   fun custom_receive/0) end),
 1870:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1871:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port),
 1872:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1873:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(head, {URL, []}, [], [], Profile),
 1874:     timer:sleep(500),
 1875:     %% Second request times out in the faulty case.
 1876:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(head, {URL, []}, [], [], Profile).
 1877: 
 1878: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1879: chunkify_fun() ->
 1880:     [{doc,"Test that a chunked encoded request does not include the 'Content-Length header'"}].
 1881: chunkify_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1882:     Msg = "HTTP/1.1 204 No Content\r\n" ++
 1883:         "Date: Thu, 23 Aug 2018 13:36:29 GMT\r\n" ++
 1884:         "Content-Type: text/html\r\n" ++
 1885:         "Server: inets/6.5.2.3\r\n" ++
 1886:         "Cache-Control: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1887:         "Pragma: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1888:         "Expires: Fri, 24 Aug 2018 07:49:35 GMT\r\n" ++
 1889:         "Transfer-Encoding: chunked\r\n" ++
 1890:         "\r\n",
 1891:     Chunk = "0\r\n\r\n",
 1892: 
 1893:     {ok, ListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active,once}, binary]),
 1894:     {ok,{_,Port}} = inet:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1895:     spawn(fun () -> custom_server(Msg, Chunk, ListenSocket,
 1896:                                   fun chunkify_receive/0) end),
 1897: 
 1898:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1899:     End = "/cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example",
 1900:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End,
 1901:     Fun = fun(_) -> {ok,<<1>>,eof_body} end,
 1902:     Acc = start,
 1903: 
 1904:     {ok, {{_,204,_}, _, _}} =
 1905:         httpc:request(put, {URL, [], "text/html", {chunkify, Fun, Acc}},
 1906:                       [], [], ?profile(Config)).
 1907: 
 1908: chunkify_receive() ->
 1909:     Error = "HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error\r\n" ++
 1910:         "Content-Length: 0\r\n\r\n",
 1911:     receive
 1912:         {tcp, Port, Msg} ->
 1913:             case binary:match(Msg, <<"content-length">>) of
 1914:                 nomatch ->
 1915:                     ct:log("Message received: ~s", [binary_to_list(Msg)]);
 1916:                 {_, _} ->
 1917:                     ct:log("Message received (negative): ~s", [binary_to_list(Msg)]),
 1918:                     %% Signal a testcase failure when the received HTTP request
 1919:                     %% contains a 'Content-Length' header.
 1920:                     gen_tcp:send(Port, Error),
 1921:                     ct:fail("Content-Length present in received headers.")
 1922:             end
 1923:     after
 1924:         1000 ->
 1925:             ct:fail("Timeout: did not receive packet")
 1926:     end.
 1927: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1928: stream_fun_server_close() ->
 1929:     [{doc, "Test that an error msg is received when using a receiver fun as stream target"}].
 1930: stream_fun_server_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1931:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/delay_close.html", Config), []},
 1932:     Self = self(),
 1933:     Fun = fun(X) -> Self ! X end,
 1934:     % Use the default proflie here as process_leak_on_keepalive depends on this case
 1935:     {ok, RequestId} = httpc:request(get, Request, [],
 1936:                                     [{sync, false}, {receiver, Fun}], ?profile(Config)),
 1937:     receive
 1938:         {RequestId, {error, Reason}} ->
 1939:             ct:log("Close ~p", [Reason]),
 1940:             ok
 1941:     after 13000 ->
 1942:             ct:fail(did_not_receive_close)
 1943:     end. 
 1944: 
 1945: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1946: server_closing_connection_on_first_response() ->
 1947:     [{doc, "Client receives \"Connection: close\" on first response."
 1948:       "A client that receives a \"close\" connection option MUST cease sending"
 1949:       "requests on that connection and close the connection after reading"
 1950:       "the response message containing the \"close\""}].
 1951: server_closing_connection_on_first_response(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1952:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1953:     ReqSrvSendOctFun =
 1954:         fun(V, U, S) ->
 1955:                 {ok, {{V, S, _}, Headers0, []}} =
 1956:                     httpc:request(get, {U, []}, [{version, V}], RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)),
 1957:                 {_, SendOctStr} =
 1958:                     proplists:lookup("x-socket-stat-send-oct", Headers0),
 1959:                 list_to_integer(SendOctStr)
 1960:         end,
 1961:     V = "HTTP/1.1",
 1962:     Url0 = url(group_name(Config), "/http_1_1_send_oct.html", Config),
 1963:     Url1 = url(group_name(Config), "/http_1_1_send_oct_and_connection_close.html", Config),
 1964:     %% Test case assumes at most one reusable past session.
 1965:     _ = ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url1, 204),
 1966:     0 = ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url0, 204),
 1967:     ok.
 1968: 
 1969: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1970: server_closing_connection_on_second_response() ->
 1971:     [{doc, "Client receives \"Connection: close\" on second response."
 1972:       "A client that receives a \"close\" connection option MUST cease sending"
 1973:       "requests on that connection and close the connection after reading"
 1974:       "the response message containing the \"close\""}].
 1975: server_closing_connection_on_second_response(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1976:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1977:     ReqSrvSendOctFun =
 1978:         fun(V, U, S) ->
 1979:                 {ok, {{V, S, _}, Headers0, []}} =
 1980:                     httpc:request(get, {U, []}, [{version, V}], RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)),
 1981:                 {_, SendOctStr} =
 1982:                     proplists:lookup("x-socket-stat-send-oct", Headers0),
 1983:                 list_to_integer(SendOctStr)
 1984:         end,
 1985:     V = "HTTP/1.1",
 1986:     Url0 = url(group_name(Config), "/http_1_1_send_oct.html", Config),
 1987:     Url1 = url(group_name(Config), "/http_1_1_send_oct_and_connection_close.html", Config),
 1988:     %% Test case assumes no reusable past sessions.
 1989:     SendOct0 = 0 = ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url0, 204),
 1990:     case ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url1, 204) of SendOct1 when SendOct1 > SendOct0 -> ok end,
 1991:     0 = ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url0, 204),
 1992:     ok.
 1993: 
 1994: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1995: slow_connection() ->
 1996:     [{doc, "Test that a request on a slow keep-alive connection won't crash the httpc_manager"}].
 1997: slow_connection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1998:     BodyFun = fun(0) -> eof;
 1999:                  (LenLeft) -> timer:sleep(1000),
 2000:                               {ok, lists:duplicate(10, "1"), LenLeft - 10}
 2001:               end,
 2002:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/httpc_SUITE:esi_post", Config),
 2003:                 [{"content-length", "100"}],
 2004:                 "text/plain",
 2005:                 {BodyFun, 100}},
 2006:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 2007:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(post, Request, [], [], Profile),
 2008:     %% Second request causes a crash if gen_server timeout is not set to infinity
 2009:     %% in httpc_handler.
 2010:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(post, Request, [], [], Profile).
 2011: 
 2012: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2013: unix_domain_socket() ->
 2014:     [{doc, "Test HTTP requests over unix domain sockets"}].
 2015: unix_domain_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2016: 
 2017:     URL = "http:///v1/kv/foo",
 2018:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 2019: 
 2020:     ct:log("Using profile ~w", [Profile]),
 2021:     {ok,[{unix_socket,?UNIX_SOCKET}]} =
 2022:         httpc:get_options([unix_socket], Profile),
 2023:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], _}}
 2024: 	= httpc:request(put, {URL, [], [], ""}, [], [], Profile),
 2025:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], _}}
 2026:         = httpc:request(get, {URL, []}, [], [], Profile).
 2027: 
 2028: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2029: delete_no_body() ->
 2030:     [{doc, "Test that a DELETE request without Body does not send a Content-Type header - Solves ERL-536"}].
 2031: delete_no_body(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2032:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/delete_no_body.html", Config),
 2033:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 2034:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 2035:     %% Simulated server replies 500 if 'Content-Type' header is present
 2036:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, _, _}} =
 2037:         httpc:request(delete, {URL, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
 2038:     {ok, {{_,500,_}, _, _}} =
 2039:         httpc:request(delete, {URL, [], "text/plain", "TEST"}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 2040:                       RequestOpts, Profile).
 2041: 
 2042: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2043: post_with_content_type(doc) ->
 2044:     ["Test that a POST request with explicit 'Content-Type' does not drop the 'Content-Type' header - Solves ERL-736"];
 2045: post_with_content_type(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2046:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/delete_no_body.html", Config),
 2047:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 2048:     %% Simulated server replies 500 if 'Content-Type' header is present
 2049:     {ok, {{_,500,_}, _, _}} =
 2050:         httpc:request(post, {URL, [], "application/x-www-form-urlencoded", ""},
 2051:                       [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)).
 2052:

 2054: request_options() ->
 2055:     [{require, ipv6_hosts},
 2056:      {doc, "Test http get request with socket options against local server (IPv6)"}].
