 2058:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
 2059:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 2060:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], _ = [_ | _]}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [],
 2061:                                                             [{socket_opts,[{ipfamily, inet6}]}],
 2062:                                                             Profile),
 2063:     {error,{failed_connect,_ }} = httpc:request(get, Request, [], [], Profile).
 2064: 
 2065: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2066: def_ssl_opt(_Config) ->
 2067:     CaCerts = public_key:cacerts_get(),
 2068:     Ver = {verify, verify_peer},
 2069:     Certs = {cacerts, CaCerts},
 2070:     [Ver, Certs] = httpc:ssl_verify_host_options(false),
 2071:     [Ver, Certs | WildCard] = httpc:ssl_verify_host_options(true),
 2072:     [{customize_hostname_check, [{match_fun, _}]}] = WildCard,
 2073:     {'EXIT', _} = catch httpc:ssl_verify_host_options(other),
 2074:     ok.
 2075: 
 2076: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2077: remote_socket_close_parallel() ->
 2078:     [{doc,
 2079:       "Verify remote socket closure (related tickets: OTP-18509, OTP-18545,"
 2080:       "ERIERL-937). Transferred data size needs to be significant, so that "
 2081:       "socket is closed, in the middle of a transfer."
 2082:       "Note: test case is require good network and CPU - due to that "
 2083:       " it is not included in all()."}, {timetrap, timer:minutes(3)}].
 2084: remote_socket_close_parallel(Config0) when is_list(Config0) ->
 2085:     ClientNumber = 200,
 2086:     Config = [{iterations, 10} | Config0],
 2087:     ClientPids =
 2088:         [spawn(?MODULE, connect, [self(), [{client_id, Id} | Config]]) ||
 2089:             Id <- lists:seq(1, ClientNumber)],
 2090:     ct:log("Started ~p clients: ~w", [ClientNumber, ClientPids]),
 2091:     Receive = fun(S) ->
 2092:                       receive
 2093:                           ok ->
 2094:                               ct:log("++ Client finished (~p)", [S]),
 2095:                               ok;
 2096:                           Other ->
 2097:                               ct:fail(Other)
 2098:                       end
 2099:               end,
 2100:     [ok = Receive(S) || S <- lists:seq(1, ClientNumber)],
 2101:     ok.
 2102: 
 2103: connect(From, Config) ->
 2104:     From ! loop(?config(iterations, Config),
 2105:                 io_lib:format("C~p|", [?config(client_id, Config)]),
 2106:                 Config).
 2107: 
 2108: loop(0, Acc, _Config) ->
 2109:     ct:log("~n~s|", [Acc]),
 2110:     ok;
 2111: loop(Cnt, Acc, Config) ->
 2112:     case request(Config) of
 2113:         {ok, {{_,200,"OK"}, _, _}} ->
 2114:             case process_info(self(), message_queue_len) of
 2115:                 {message_queue_len,0} ->
 2116:                     loop(Cnt-1, Acc ++ ".", Config);
 2117:                 _ ->
 2118:                     %% queue is expected to be empty
 2119:                     queue_check(),
 2120:                     ct:log("~n~s|", [Acc ++ "x"]),
 2121:                     fail
 2122:             end;
 2123:         {ok, NotOk} ->
 2124:             ct:log("200 OK was not received~n~p", [NotOk]),
 2125:             fail;
 2126:         Error ->
 2127:             ct:log("Error: ~p",[Error]),
 2128:             fail
 2129:     end.
 2130: 
 2131: queue_check() ->
 2132:     receive
 2133:         {http, {ReqId, {_Result, _Head, Data}}} when is_binary(Data) ->
 2134:             ct:log("Unexpected data received: ~p ",
 2135:                       [ReqId]),
 2136:             queue_check();
 2137:         X ->
 2138:             ct:log("Caught unexpected something else: ~p",[X]),
 2139:             queue_check()
 2140:     after 5000 ->
 2141:             done
 2142:     end.
 2143: 
 2144: request(Config) ->
 2145:     Request = {url(group_name(Config), "/httpc_SUITE/foo", Config), []},
 2146:     httpc:request(get, Request, [],[{sync,true}, {body_format,binary}], ?profile(Config)).
 2147: 
 2148: foo(SID, _Env, _Input) ->
 2149:     EightyMillionBits = 80000000, %% ~10MB transferred
 2150:     mod_esi:deliver(SID, [<<0:EightyMillionBits>>]).
 2151: 
 2152: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2153: %% Internal Functions ------------------------------------------------
 2154: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2155: stream(ReceiverPid, Receiver, Config) ->
 2156:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
 2157:     Options     = [{sync, false}, {receiver, Receiver}],
 2158:     {ok, RequestId} =
 2159: 	 httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], Options, ?profile(Config)),
 2160:      Body =
 2161: 	 receive
 2162: 	     {reply, ReceiverPid, {RequestId, {{_, 200, _}, _, B}}} ->
 2163: 		 B;
 2164: 	     {reply, ReceiverPid, Msg} ->
 2165: 		 ct:fail(Msg);
 2166: 	     {bad_reply, ReceiverPid, Msg} ->
 2167: 		 ct:fail(Msg)
 2168: 	 end,
 2169: 
 2170:      inets_test_lib:check_body(binary_to_list(Body)).
 2171: 
 2172: create_receiver(Type) ->
 2173:     Parent = self(),
 2174:     Receiver = fun() -> receiver(Type, Parent) end,
 2175:     spawn_link(Receiver).
 2176: 
 2177: stop_receiver(Pid) ->
 2178:     Pid ! {stop, self()}.
 2179: 
 2180: receiver(Type, Parent) ->
 2181:     receive
 2182: 	{stop, Parent} ->
 2183: 	    ok;
 2184: 	{http, ReplyInfo} when (Type =:= pid) ->
 2185: 	    Parent ! {reply, self(), ReplyInfo},
 2186: 	    receiver(Type, Parent);
 2187: 
 2188: 	{Type, ReplyInfo} ->
 2189: 	    Parent ! {reply, self(), ReplyInfo},
 2190: 	    receiver(Type, Parent);
 2191: 
 2192: 	Crap ->
 2193: 	    Parent ! {reply, self(), {bad_reply, Crap}},
 2194: 	    receiver(Type, Parent)
 2195:     end.
 2196: 
 2197: stream_deliver_fun(ReceiverPid) ->
 2198:     fun(ReplyInfo) -> stream_deliver(ReplyInfo, function, ReceiverPid) end.
 2199: 
 2200: stream_deliver(ReplyInfo, Type, ReceiverPid) ->
 2201:     ReceiverPid ! {Type, ReplyInfo},
 2202:     ok.
 2203: 
 2204: stream_test(Request, To, RequestOpts, Profile) ->
 2205:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], Body}} =
 2206: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
 2207:     {ok, RequestId} =
 2208: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}, To | RequestOpts], Profile),
 2209: 
 2210:     StreamedBody =
 2211: 	receive
 2212: 	    {http, {RequestId, stream_start, _Headers}} ->
 2213: 		receive_streamed_body(RequestId, <<>>);
 2214: 	    {http, {RequestId, stream_start, _Headers, Pid}}  ->
 2215: 		receive_streamed_body(RequestId, <<>>, Pid);
 2216: 	    {http, Msg} ->
 2217: 		ct:fail(Msg)
 2218: 	end,
 2219: 
 2220:     Body = binary_to_list(StreamedBody).
 2221: 
 2222: not_streamed_test(Request, To, RequestOpts, Profile) ->
 2223:     {ok, {{_,Code,_}, [_ | _], Body}} =
 2224: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 2225:                       [{body_format, binary} | RequestOpts], Profile),
 2226:     {ok, RequestId} =
 2227: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 2228:                       [{body_format, binary}, {sync, false}, To | RequestOpts], Profile),
 2229: 
 2230:     receive
 2231: 	{http, {RequestId, {{_, Code, _}, _Headers, Body}}} ->
 2232: 	    {Code, binary_to_list(Body)};
 2233: 	{http, Msg} ->
 2234: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
 2235:     end.
 2236: 
 2237: url(Group, End, Config) when Group == http;
 2238:                              Group == sim_http;
 2239:                              Group == sim_http_process_leak;
 2240:                              Group == http_internal;
 2241:                              Group == http_internal_minimum_bytes ->
 2242:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 2243:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 2244:     ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End;
 2245: url(Group, End, Config) when Group == http_ipv6;
 2246:                              Group == sim_http_ipv6 ->
 2247:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 2248:     ?URL_START ++ "[::1]" ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End;
 2249: url(Group, End, Config) when Group == https;
 2250:                              Group == sim_https ->
 2251:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 2252:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 2253:     ?TLS_URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End.
 2254: 
 2255: url(Group, UserInfo, End, Config) when Group == http;
 2256:                                        Group == sim_http;
 2257:                                        Group == sim_http_process_leak ->
 2258:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 2259:     {ok, Hostname} = inet:gethostname(),
 2260:     ?URL_START ++ UserInfo ++ "@" ++ Hostname ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End;
 2261: url(sim_http_ipv6, UserInfo, End, Config) ->
 2262:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 2263:     ?URL_START ++ UserInfo ++ "@" ++ "[::1]:" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End;
 2264: url(Group, UserInfo, End, Config) when Group == https;
 2265:                                        Group == sim_https ->
 2266:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 2267:     {ok, Hostname} = inet:gethostname(),
 2268:     ?TLS_URL_START ++ UserInfo ++ "@" ++ Hostname ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End.
 2269: 
 2270: % Only for use in the `mixed` test group, where both http and https
 2271: % URLs are possible.
 2272: mixed_url(http, End, Config) ->
 2273:     mixed_url(http_port, End, Config);
 2274: mixed_url(https, End, Config) ->
 2275:     mixed_url(https_port, End, Config);
 2276: mixed_url(PortType, End, Config) ->
 2277:     Port = proplists:get_value(PortType, Config),
 2278:     {ok, Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 2279:     Start = case PortType of
 2280:         http_port -> ?URL_START;
 2281:         https_port -> ?TLS_URL_START
 2282:     end,
 2283:     Start ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End.
 2284: 
 2285: group_name(Config) ->
 2286:     GroupProp = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
 2287:     proplists:get_value(name, GroupProp).
 2288: 
 2289: server_start(Group, _) when Group == sim_http; Group == sim_http_process_leak ->
 2290:     Inet = inet_version(),
 2291:     ok = httpc:set_options([{ipfamily, Inet},{unix_socket, undefined}]),
 2292:     {_Pid, Port} = http_test_lib:dummy_server(ip_comm, Inet, [{content_cb, ?MODULE}]),
 2293:     Port;
 2294: 
 2295: server_start(sim_http_ipv6, _) ->
 2296:     ok = httpc:set_options([{ipfamily, inet6},{unix_socket, undefined}]),
 2297:     {_Pid, Port} = http_test_lib:dummy_server(ip_comm, inet6, [{content_cb, ?MODULE}]),
 2298:     Port;
 2299: 
 2300: server_start(sim_https, SslConfig) ->
 2301:     Inet = inet_version(),
 2302:     ok = httpc:set_options([{ipfamily, Inet},{unix_socket, undefined}]),
 2303:     {_Pid, Port} = http_test_lib:dummy_server(ssl, Inet, [{ssl, SslConfig}, {content_cb, ?MODULE}]),
 2304:     Port;
 2305: 
 2306: server_start(http_unix_socket, Config) ->
 2307:     Inet = local,
 2308:     Socket = proplists:get_value(unix_socket, Config),
 2309:     HttpcOptions = [{ipfamily, Inet},{unix_socket, Socket}],
 2310:     {Pid, Port} = http_test_lib:dummy_server(unix_socket, Inet, [{content_cb, ?MODULE},
 2311:                                                                   {unix_socket, Socket}]),
 2312:     {Pid, Port, HttpcOptions};
 2313: server_start(http_ipv6, HttpdConfig) ->
 2314:     {ok, Pid} = inets:start(httpd, HttpdConfig),
 2315:     Serv = inets:services_info(),
 2316:     {value, {_, _, Info}} = lists:keysearch(Pid, 2, Serv),
 2317:     proplists:get_value(port, Info);
 2318: server_start(sim_mixed, Config) ->
 2319:     % For the mixed http/https case, we start two servers and return both ports.
 2320:     {server_start(sim_http, []), server_start(sim_https, Config)};
 2321: server_start(_, HttpdConfig) ->
 2322:     {ok, Pid} = inets:start(httpd, HttpdConfig),
 2323:     Serv = inets:services_info(),
 2324:     ok = httpc:set_options([{ipfamily, inet_version()},{unix_socket, undefined}]),
 2325:     {value, {_, _, Info}} = lists:keysearch(Pid, 2, Serv),
 2326:     proplists:get_value(port, Info).
 2327: 
 2328: server_config(base, Config) ->
 2329:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2330:     [{port, 0},
 2331:      {server_name,"httpc_test"},
 2332:      {server_root, ServerRoot},
 2333:      {document_root, proplists:get_value(doc_root, Config)},
 2334:      {mime_type, "text/plain"}];
 2335: server_config(base_http, Config) ->
 2336:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2337:     server_config(base, Config) ++
 2338:         [{script_alias,
 2339:           {"/cgi-bin/", filename:join(ServerRoot, "cgi-bin") ++ "/"}}];
 2340: server_config(http, Config) ->
 2341:     server_config(base_http, Config) ++
 2342:         [{bind_address, any},
 2343:          {ipfamily, inet_version()}];
 2344: server_config(http_ipv6, Config) ->
 2345:     server_config(base_http, Config) ++
 2346:         [{bind_address, {0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1}},
 2347:          {ipfamily, inet6}];
 2348: server_config(http_internal, Config) ->
 2349:     server_config(http, Config) ++
 2350:         [{erl_script_alias, {"", [httpc_SUITE]}}];
 2351: server_config(http_internal_minimum_bytes, Config) ->
 2352:     server_config(http_internal, Config) ++
 2353:         [{minimum_bytes_per_second, 100}];
 2354: server_config(https, Config) ->
 2355:     [{socket_type, {ssl, ssl_config(Config)}} | server_config(http, Config)];
 2356: server_config(sim_https, Config) ->
 2357:     ssl_config(Config);
 2358: server_config(http_unix_socket, _Config) ->
 2359:     Socket = ?UNIX_SOCKET,
 2360:     [{unix_socket, Socket}];
 2361: server_config(_, _) ->
 2362:     [].
 2363: 
 2364: esi_post(Sid, _Env, _Input) ->
 2365:     mod_esi:deliver(Sid, ["OK"]).
 2366: 
 2367: start_apps(https) ->
 2368:     inets_test_lib:start_apps([crypto, public_key, ssl]);
 2369: start_apps(sim_https) ->
 2370:     inets_test_lib:start_apps([crypto, public_key, ssl]);
 2371: start_apps(sim_mixed) ->
 2372:     inets_test_lib:start_apps([crypto, public_key, ssl]);
 2373: start_apps(_) ->
 2374:     ok.
 2375: 
 2376: ssl_config(Config) ->
 2377:     SSLConf = proplists:get_value(ssl_conf, Config),
 2378:     proplists:get_value(server_config, SSLConf).
 2379: 
 2380: setup_server_dirs(ServerRoot, DocRoot, DataDir) ->   
 2381:     CgiDir =  filename:join(ServerRoot, "cgi-bin"),
 2382:     ok = file:make_dir(ServerRoot),
 2383:     ok = file:make_dir(DocRoot),
 2384:     ok = file:make_dir(CgiDir),
 2385: 
 2386:     {ok, Files} = file:list_dir(DataDir),
 2387:     
 2388:     lists:foreach(fun(File) -> case lists:suffix(".html", File) of
 2389: 				   true ->
 2390: 				       inets_test_lib:copy_file(File, 
 2391: 								DataDir, 
 2392: 								DocRoot);
 2393: 				   false ->
 2394: 				       ok
 2395: 			       end
 2396: 		  end, Files),
 2397:     
 2398:     Cgi = case os:type() of
 2399: 	      {win32, _} ->
 2400: 		  "cgi_echo.exe";
 2401: 	      _ ->
 2402: 		  "cgi_echo"
 2403: 	  end,
 2404:     
 2405:     {ok, _} = inets_test_lib:copy_file(Cgi, DataDir, CgiDir),
 2406:     AbsCgi = filename:join([CgiDir, Cgi]),
 2407:     {ok, FileInfo} = file:read_file_info(AbsCgi),
 2408:     ok = file:write_file_info(AbsCgi, FileInfo#file_info{mode = 8#00755}).
 2409: 
 2410: 
 2411: keep_alive_requests(Request, Profile) ->
 2412:     {ok, RequestIdA0} =
 2413: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2414:     {ok, RequestIdA1} =
 2415: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2416:     {ok, RequestIdA2} =
 2417: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2418: 
 2419:     receive_replys([RequestIdA0, RequestIdA1, RequestIdA2]),
 2420: 
 2421:     {ok, RequestIdB0} =
 2422: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2423:     {ok, RequestIdB1} =
 2424: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2425:     {ok, RequestIdB2} =
 2426: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2427: 
 2428:     ok = httpc:cancel_request(RequestIdB1, Profile),
 2429:     ct:log("Cancel ~p~n", [RequestIdB1]),
 2430:     receive_replys([RequestIdB0, RequestIdB2]).
 2431: 
 2432: receive_replys([]) ->
 2433:     ok;
 2434: receive_replys([ID|IDs]) ->
 2435:     receive
 2436: 	{http, {ID, {{_, 200, _}, [_|_], _}}} ->
 2437: 	    receive_replys(IDs);
 2438: 	{http, {Other, {{_, 200, _}, [_|_], _}}} ->
 2439: 	    ct:log("~p",[{recived_canceld_id, Other}])
 2440:     end.
 2441: 
 2442: inet_version() ->
 2443:     inet. %% Just run inet for now
 2444:     %% case gen_tcp:listen(0,[inet6]) of
 2445:     %% 	{ok, S} ->
 2446:     %% 	    gen_tcp:close(S),
 2447:     %% 	    inet6;
 2448:     %% 	_ ->
 2449:     %% 	    inet
 2450:     %%end.
 2451: 
 2452: handle_request(Module, Function, Args, Socket) ->
 2453:     case Module:Function(Args) of
 2454: 	{ok, Result} ->
 2455: 	    case handle_http_msg(Result, Socket, []) of
 2456: 		stop ->
 2457: 		    stop;
 2458: 		<<>> ->
 2459: 		    {httpd_request, parse, [[{max_uri,?HTTP_MAX_URI_SIZE},
 2460: 					     {max_header, ?HTTP_MAX_HEADER_SIZE},
 2461: 					     {max_version,?HTTP_MAX_VERSION_STRING}, 
 2462: 					     {max_method, ?HTTP_MAX_METHOD_STRING},
 2463: 					     {max_content_length, ?HTTP_MAX_CONTENT_LENGTH},
 2464: 					     {customize, httpd_custom}
 2465: 					    ]]};
 2466: 		Data ->	
 2467: 		    handle_request(httpd_request, parse, 
 2468: 				   [Data, [{max_uri,    ?HTTP_MAX_URI_SIZE},
 2469: 					   {max_header, ?HTTP_MAX_HEADER_SIZE},
 2470: 					    {max_version,?HTTP_MAX_VERSION_STRING}, 
 2471: 					    {max_method, ?HTTP_MAX_METHOD_STRING},
 2472: 					    {max_content_length, ?HTTP_MAX_CONTENT_LENGTH},
 2473: 					   {customize, httpd_custom}
 2474: 					  ]], Socket)
 2475: 	    end;
 2476: 	NewMFA ->
 2477: 	    NewMFA
 2478:     end.
 2479: 
 2480: handle_http_msg({Method, RelUri, _, {_, Headers}, Body}, Socket, _) ->
 2481:     ct:log("Request: ~p ~p", [Method, RelUri]),
 2482: 
 2483:     NextRequest = 
 2484: 	case RelUri of
 2485: 	    "/dummy_headers.html" ->
 2486: 		<<>>;
 2487: 	    "/no_headers.html" ->
 2488: 		stop;
 2489: 	    "/just_close.html" ->
 2490: 		stop;
 2491: 	    _ ->
 2492: 		ContentLength = content_length(Headers),    
 2493: 		case byte_size(Body) - ContentLength of
 2494: 		    0 ->
 2495: 			<<>>;
 2496: 		    _ ->
 2497: 			<<_BodyThisReq:ContentLength/binary, 
 2498: 			  Next/binary>> = Body,
 2499: 			Next
 2500: 		end
 2501: 	end,
 2502:    
 2503:     case global:trans({cookies, verify}, fun() -> unset end, [node()], 0) of
 2504:         aborted->
 2505:             % somebody has the lock and wants us to check
 2506:             check_cookie(Headers);
 2507:         unset ->
 2508:             ok
 2509:     end,
 2510: 
 2511:    {ok, {_, Port}} = sockname(Socket),
 2512: 
 2513: 
 2514:     DefaultResponse = "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++
 2515: 	"Content-Length:32\r\n\r\n"
 2516: 	"<HTML><BODY>foobar</BODY></HTML>",
 2517: 
 2518:     Msg = handle_uri(Method,RelUri, Port, Headers, Socket, DefaultResponse),
 2519: 
 2520:     case Msg of
 2521: 	ok ->
 2522: 	    ok;
 2523: 	close ->
 2524: 	    %% Nothing to send, just close
 2525: 	    close(Socket);
 2526: 	_ when is_list(Msg) orelse is_binary(Msg) ->
 2527: 	    case Msg of
 2528: 		[] ->
 2529: 		    ct:log("Empty Msg", []);
 2530: 		_ ->
 2531: 		    ct:log("Response: ~p", [Msg]),
 2532: 		    send(Socket, Msg)
 2533: 	    end
 2534:     end,
 2535:     NextRequest.
 2536: 
 2537: ensure_host_header_with_port([]) ->
 2538:     false;
 2539: ensure_host_header_with_port([{"host", Host}| _]) ->
 2540:     case string:tokens(Host, [$:]) of
 2541: 	[_ActualHost, _Port] ->
 2542: 	    true;
 2543: 	_ ->
 2544: 	    false
 2545:     end;
 2546: ensure_host_header_with_port([_|T]) ->
 2547:     ensure_host_header_with_port(T).
 2548: 
 2549: auth_header([]) ->
 2550:     auth_header_not_found;
 2551: auth_header([{"authorization", Value} | _]) ->
 2552:     {ok, string:strip(Value)};
 2553: auth_header([_ | Tail]) ->
 2554:     auth_header(Tail).
 2555: 
 2556: content_type_header([]) ->
 2557:     not_found;
 2558: content_type_header([{"content-type", Value}|_]) ->
 2559:     {ok, string:strip(Value)};
 2560: content_type_header([_|T]) ->
 2561:     content_type_header(T).
 2562: 
 2563: handle_auth("Basic " ++ UserInfo, Challenge, DefaultResponse) ->
 2564:     case string:tokens(base64:decode_to_string(UserInfo), ":") of
 2565: 	["alladin@example.com", "sesame"] = Auth ->
 2566: 	    ct:log("Auth: ~p~n", [Auth]),
 2567: 	    DefaultResponse;
 2568: 	Other ->
 2569: 	    ct:log("UnAuth: ~p~n", [Other]),
 2570: 	    Challenge
 2571:     end.
 2572: 
 2573: check_cookie([]) ->
 2574:     ct:fail(no_cookie_header);
 2575: check_cookie([{"cookie", _} | _]) ->
 2576:     ok;
 2577: check_cookie([_Head | Tail]) ->
 2578:    check_cookie(Tail).
 2579: 
 2580: content_length([]) ->
 2581:     0;
 2582: content_length([{"content-length", Value}|_]) ->
 2583:     list_to_integer(string:strip(Value));
 2584: content_length([_Head | Tail]) ->
 2585:    content_length(Tail).
 2586: 
 2587: handle_uri("GET","/dummy.html?foo=bar",_,_,_,_) ->
 2588:     "HTTP/1.0 200 OK\r\n\r\nTEST";
 2589: 
 2590: handle_uri("GET","/space%20.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2591:     Body = "<HTML><BODY>foobar</BODY></HTML>",
 2592:     "HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n" ++
 2593:         "Content-Length:" ++ integer_to_list(length(Body)) ++ "\r\n\r\n" ++
 2594:         Body;
 2595: 
 2596: handle_uri(_,"/just_close.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2597: 		close;
 2598: handle_uri(_,"/no_content.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2599:     "HTTP/1.0 204 No Content\r\n\r\n";
 2600: 
 2601: handle_uri(_,"/no_headers.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2602:     "HTTP/1.0 200 OK\r\n\r\nTEST";
 2603: 
 2604: handle_uri("TRACE","/trace.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2605:     Body = "TRACE /trace.html simulate HTTP TRACE ",
 2606:     "HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n" ++ "Content-Length:" ++ integer_to_list(length(Body)) ++ "\r\n\r\n" ++ Body;
 2607: 
 2608: handle_uri(_,"/ensure_host_header_with_port.html",_,Headers,_,_) ->
 2609:     case ensure_host_header_with_port(Headers) of
 2610: 	true ->
 2611: 	    B =
 2612: 		"<HTML><BODY>" ++
 2613: 		"host with port" ++
 2614: 		"</BODY></HTML>",
 2615: 	    Len = integer_to_list(length(B)),
 2616: 	    "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++
 2617: 		"Content-Length:" ++ Len ++ "\r\n\r\n" ++ B;
 2618: 	false ->
 2619: 	    B =
 2620: 		"<HTML><BODY>" ++
 2621: 		"Internal Server Error - host without port" ++
 2622: 		"</BODY></HTML>",
 2623: 	    Len = integer_to_list(length(B)),
 2624: 	    "HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error\r\n" ++
 2625: 		"Content-Length:" ++ Len ++ "\r\n\r\n" ++ B
 2626:     end;
 2627: handle_uri(_,"/redirect_ensure_host_header_with_port.html",Port,_,Socket,_) ->
 2628:     NewUri = url_start(Socket) ++
 2629: 	integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/ensure_host_header_with_port.html",
 2630:     "HTTP/1.1 302 Found \r\n" ++
 2631: 	"Location:" ++ NewUri ++  "\r\n" ++
 2632: 	"Content-Length:0\r\n\r\n";
 2633: 
 2634: handle_uri(_,"/300.html",Port,_,Socket,_) ->
 2635:     NewUri = url_start(Socket) ++
 2636: 	integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/dummy.html",
 2637:   Body = "<HTML><BODY><a href=" ++ NewUri ++
 2638: 	">New place</a></BODY></HTML>",
 2639:     "HTTP/1.1 300 Multiple Choices\r\n" ++
 2640: 	"Location:" ++ NewUri ++  "\r\n" ++
 2641: 	"Content-Length:" ++ integer_to_list(length(Body))
 2642: 	++ "\r\n\r\n" ++ Body;
 2643:

 2649: 	"Content-Length:0\r\n\r\n";

 2755: handle_uri(_,"/404.html",_,_,_,_) ->

 2760: handle_uri(_,"/500.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2761:     "HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error\r\n" ++
 2762: 	"Content-Length:47\r\n\r\n" ++
 2763: 	"<HTML><BODY>Internal Server Error</BODY></HTML>";
 2764: 
 2765: handle_uri(_,"/503.html",_,_,_,DefaultResponse) ->
 2766:     case ets:lookup(unavailable, 503) of
 2767: 	[{503, unavailable}] ->
 2768: 	    ets:insert(unavailable, {503, available}),
 2769: 	    "HTTP/1.1 503 Service Unavailable\r\n" ++
 2770: 		"Retry-After:5\r\n" ++
 2771: 		"Content-Length:47\r\n\r\n" ++
 2772: 		"<HTML><BODY>Internal Server Error</BODY></HTML>";
 2773: 	[{503, available}]   ->
 2774: 	    DefaultResponse;
 2775: 	[{503, long_unavailable}]  ->
 2776: 	    "HTTP/1.1 503 Service Unavailable\r\n" ++
 2777: 		"Retry-After:120\r\n" ++
 2778: 		"Content-Length:47\r\n\r\n" ++
 2779: 		"<HTML><BODY>Internal Server Error</BODY></HTML>"
 2780:     end;
 2781: 
 2782: handle_uri(_,"/redirectloop.html",Port,_,Socket,_) ->
 2783:     %% Create a potential endless loop!
 2784:     NewUri = url_start(Socket) ++
 2785: 	integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/redirectloop.html",
 2786:      Body = "<HTML><BODY><a href=" ++ NewUri ++
 2787: 	">New place</a></BODY></HTML>",
 2788:     "HTTP/1.1 300 Multiple Choices\r\n" ++
 2789: 	"Location:" ++ NewUri ++  "\r\n" ++
 2790: 	"Content-Length:" ++ integer_to_list(length(Body))
 2791: 	++ "\r\n\r\n" ++ Body;
 2792: 
 2793: handle_uri(_,"/userinfo.html", _,Headers,_, DefaultResponse) ->
 2794:     Challenge = "HTTP/1.1 401 Unauthorized \r\n" ++
 2795: 	"WWW-Authenticate:Basic" ++"\r\n" ++
 2796: 	"Content-Length:0\r\n\r\n",
 2797:     case auth_header(Headers) of
 2798: 	{ok, Value} ->
 2799: 	    handle_auth(Value, Challenge, DefaultResponse);
 2800: 	_ ->
 2801: 	    Challenge
 2802:     end;
 2803: 
 2804: handle_uri(_,"/dummy_headers.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2805:     %% The client will only care about the Transfer-Encoding
 2806:     %% header the rest of these headers are left to the
 2807:     %% user to evaluate. This is not a valid response
 2808:     %% it only tests that the header handling code works.
 2809:     Head = "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++
 2810: 	"Pragma:1#no-cache\r\n"  ++
 2811: 	"Via:1.0 fred, 1.1 nowhere.com (Apache/1.1)\r\n"  ++
 2812: 	"Warning:1#pseudonym foobar\r\n"  ++
 2813: 	"Vary:*\r\n"  ++
 2814: 	"Trailer:Other:inets_test\r\n"  ++
 2815: 	"Upgrade:HTTP/2.0\r\n"  ++
 2816: 	"Age:4711\r\n" ++
 2817: 	"Transfer-Encoding:chunked\r\n" ++
 2818: 	"Content-Encoding:foo\r\n" ++
 2819: 	"Content-Language:en\r\n"  ++
 2820: 	"Content-Location:http://www.foobar.se\r\n"  ++
 2821: 	"Content-MD5:104528739076276072743283077410617235478\r\n"
 2822: 	++
 2823: 	"Content-Range:Sat, 29 Oct 1994 19:43:31 GMT\r\n"  ++
 2824: 	"Expires:Sat, 29 Oct 1994 19:43:31 GMT\r\n"  ++
 2825: 	"Proxy-Authenticate:#1Basic"  ++
 2826: 	"\r\n\r\n",
 2827:     send(Socket, Head),
 2828:     send(Socket, http_chunk:encode("<HTML><BODY>fo")),
 2829:     send(Socket, http_chunk:encode("obar</BODY></HTML>")),
 2830:     http_chunk:encode_last();
 2831: 
 2832: handle_uri(_,"/obs_folded_headers.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2833:     "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n"
 2834:     "Content-Length:5\r\n"
 2835:     "Folded: a\r\n"
 2836:     " b\r\n\r\n"
 2837:     "Hello";

 2904: handle_uri(_,"/once_chunked.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->

 2910: 	 http_chunk:encode("obar</BODY></HTML>")),
 2911:     http_chunk:encode_last();

 2913: handle_uri(_,"/404_chunked.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2914:     Head =  "HTTP/1.1 404 not found\r\n" ++
 2915: 	"Transfer-Encoding:Chunked\r\n\r\n",
 2916:     send(Socket, Head),
 2917:     send(Socket, http_chunk:encode("<HTML><BODY>Not ")),
 2918:     send(Socket,
 2919: 	 http_chunk:encode("found</BODY></HTML>")),
 2920:     http_chunk:encode_last();
 2921: 
 2922: handle_uri(_,"/single_chunk.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2923:     Chunk =  "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++
 2924:         "Transfer-Encoding:Chunked\r\n\r\n" ++
 2925:         http_chunk:encode("<HTML><BODY>fo") ++
 2926:         http_chunk:encode("obar</BODY></HTML>") ++
 2927:         http_chunk:encode_last(),
 2928:     send(Socket, Chunk);
 2929: 
 2930: handle_uri(_,"/http_1_0_no_length_single.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2931:     Body = "HTTP/1.0 200 ok\r\n"
 2932:         "Content-type:text/plain\r\n\r\n"
 2933:         "single packet",
 2934:     send(Socket, Body),
 2935:     close(Socket);
 2936: 
 2937: handle_uri(_,"/http_1_0_no_length_multiple.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2938:     Head = "HTTP/1.0 200 ok\r\n"
 2939:         "Content-type:text/plain\r\n\r\n"
 2940:         "multiple packets, ",
 2941:     send(Socket, Head),
 2942:     %% long body to make sure it will be sent in multiple tcp packets
 2943:     send(Socket, string:copies("other multiple packets ", 200)),
 2944:     close(Socket);
 2945: 
 2946: handle_uri(_,"/large_404_response.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2947:     %% long body to make sure it will be sent in multiple tcp packets
 2948:     Body = string:copies("other multiple packets ", 200),
 2949:     Head = io_lib:format("HTTP/1.1 404 not found\r\n"
 2950:                          "Content-length: ~B\r\n"
 2951:                          "Content-type: text/plain\r\n\r\n",
 2952:                          [length(Body)]),
 2953:     send(Socket, Head),
 2954:     send(Socket, Body),
 2955:     close(Socket);
 2956: 
 2957: handle_uri(_,"/once.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2958:     Head =  "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++
 2959: 	"Content-Length:32\r\n\r\n",
 2960:     send(Socket, Head),
 2961:     send(Socket, "<HTML><BODY>fo"),
 2962:     ct:sleep(1000),
 2963:     send(Socket, "ob"),
 2964:     ct:sleep(1000),
 2965:     send(Socket, "ar</BODY></HTML>");
 2966: 
 2967: handle_uri(_,"/invalid_http.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2968:     "HTTP/1.1 301\r\nDate:Sun, 09 Dec 2007 13:04:18 GMT\r\n" ++
 2969: 	"Transfer-Encoding:chunked\r\n\r\n";
 2970: 
 2971: handle_uri(_,"/invalid_chunk_size.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2972:     "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++
 2973: 	"Transfer-Encoding:chunked\r\n\r\nåäö\r\n";
 2974: 
 2975: handle_uri(_,"/missing_reason_phrase.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2976:     "HTTP/1.1 200\r\n" ++
 2977: 	"Content-Length: 32\r\n\r\n"
 2978: 	"<HTML><BODY>foobar</BODY></HTML>";
 2979: 
 2980: handle_uri(_,"/missing_CR.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2981:     "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\n" ++
 2982: 	"Content-Length:32\r\n\n" ++
 2983: 	"<HTML><BODY>foobar</BODY></HTML>";
 2984: 
 2985: handle_uri(_,"/multipart_chunks.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2986:     Head = "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++
 2987: 	"Transfer-Encoding:chunked\r\n" ++
 2988: 	"Date: " ++ httpd_util:rfc1123_date() ++ "\r\n"
 2989: 	"Connection: Keep-Alive\r\n" ++
 2990: 	"Content-Type: multipart/x-mixed-replace; boundary=chunk_boundary\r\n" ++
 2991: 	"\r\n",
 2992:     send(Socket, Head),
 2993:     send_multipart_chunks(Socket),
 2994:     http_chunk:encode_last();
 2995: handle_uri(_,"/delay_close.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2996:     ct:sleep(10000),
 2997:     close(Socket);
 2998: handle_uri("HEAD",_,_,_,_,_) ->
 2999:     "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++
 3000: 	"Content-Length:0\r\n\r\n";
 3001: handle_uri("PUT","/v1/kv/foo",_,_,_,_) ->
 3002:     "HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n" ++
 3003:         "Date: Tue, 20 Feb 2018 14:39:08 GMT\r\n" ++
 3004:         "Content-Length: 5\r\n\r\n" ++
 3005:         "Content-Type: application/json\r\n\r\n" ++
 3006:         "true\n";
 3007: handle_uri("GET","/v1/kv/foo",_,_,_,_) ->
 3008:     "HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n" ++
 3009:         "Date: Tue, 20 Feb 2018 14:39:08 GMT\r\n" ++
 3010:         "Content-Length: 24\r\n" ++
 3011:         "Content-Type: application/json\r\n\r\n" ++
 3012:         "[{\"Value\": \"aGVsbG8=\"}]\n";
 3013: handle_uri(_,"/http_1_1_send_oct.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 3014:     "HTTP/1.1 204 No Content\r\n" ++
 3015:         "X-Socket-Stat-Send-Oct: " ++ integer_to_list(get_stat(Socket, send_oct)) ++ "\r\n" ++
 3016:         "\r\n";
 3017: handle_uri(_,"/http_1_1_send_oct_and_connection_close.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 3018:     "HTTP/1.1 204 No Content\r\n" ++
 3019:         "X-Socket-Stat-Send-Oct: " ++ integer_to_list(get_stat(Socket, send_oct)) ++ "\r\n" ++
 3020:         "Connection: close\r\n" ++
 3021:         "\r\n";
 3022: handle_uri(_,"/delete_no_body.html", _,Headers,_, DefaultResponse) ->
 3023:     Error = "HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error\r\n" ++
 3024: 	"Content-Length:0\r\n\r\n",
 3025:     case content_type_header(Headers) of
 3026: 	{ok, _} ->
 3027: 	    Error;
 3028: 	not_found ->
 3029: 	    DefaultResponse
 3030:     end;
 3031: handle_uri(_,_,_,_,_,DefaultResponse) ->
 3032:     DefaultResponse.
 3033: 
 3034: get_stat(S, Opt) ->
 3035:     case getstat(S, [Opt]) of
 3036:         {ok, [{Opt, V}]} when is_integer(V) ->
 3037:             V;
 3038:         {error, _} = E ->
 3039:             E
 3040:     end.
 3041: 
 3042: getstat(#sslsocket{} = S, Opts) ->
 3043:     ssl:getstat(S, Opts);
 3044: getstat(S, Opts) ->
 3045:     inet:getstat(S, Opts).
 3046: 
 3047: url_start(#sslsocket{}) ->
 3048:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 3049:     ?TLS_URL_START ++ Host ++ ":";
 3050: url_start(_) ->
 3051:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 3052:     ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":".
 3053: 
 3054: send(#sslsocket{} = S, Msg) ->
 3055:     ssl:send(S, Msg);
 3056: send(S, Msg) ->
 3057:     gen_tcp:send(S, Msg).
 3058: 
 3059: close(#sslsocket{} = S) ->
 3060:     ssl:close(S);
 3061: close(S) ->
 3062:     gen_tcp:close(S).
 3063: 
 3064: sockname(#sslsocket{}= S) ->
 3065:     ssl:sockname(S);
 3066: sockname(S) ->
 3067:     inet:sockname(S).
 3068: 
 3069: receive_streamed_body(RequestId, Body) ->
 3070:     receive
 3071: 	{http, {RequestId, stream, BinBodyPart}} ->
 3072: 	    receive_streamed_body(RequestId,
 3073: 				  <<Body/binary, BinBodyPart/binary>>);
 3074: 	{http, {RequestId, stream_end, _Headers}} ->
 3075: 	    Body;
 3076: 	{http, Msg} ->
 3077: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
 3078:     end.
 3079: 
 3080: receive_streamed_body(RequestId, Body, Pid) ->
 3081:     httpc:stream_next(Pid),
 3082:     ct:log("~p:receive_streamed_body -> requested next stream ~n", [?MODULE]),
 3083:     receive
 3084: 	{http, {RequestId, stream, BinBodyPart}} ->
 3085: 	    %% Make sure the httpc hasn't sent us the next 'stream'
 3086: 	    %% without our request.
 3087: 	    receive
 3088: 		{http, {RequestId, stream, _}} = Msg ->
 3089: 		    ct:fail({unexpected_flood_of_stream, Msg})
 3090: 	    after
 3091: 		1000 ->
 3092: 		    ok
 3093: 	    end,
 3094: 	    receive_streamed_body(RequestId,
 3095: 				  <<Body/binary, BinBodyPart/binary>>,
 3096: 				  Pid);
 3097: 	{http, {RequestId, stream_end, _Headers}} ->
 3098: 	    Body;
 3099: 	{http, Msg} ->
 3100: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
 3101:     end.
 3102: 
 3103: %% -----------------------------------------------------
 3104: %% A sequence number handler
 3105: %% The purpose is to be able to pair requests with responses.
 3106: 
 3107: start_sequence_number_server() ->
 3108:     proc_lib:spawn(fun() -> loop_sequence_number(1) end).
 3109: 
 3110: loop_sequence_number(N) ->
 3111:     receive
 3112: 	shutdown ->
 3113: 	    ok;
 3114: 	{From, get_next} ->
 3115: 	    From ! {next_is, N},
 3116: 	    loop_sequence_number(N + 1)
 3117:     end.
 3118: 
 3119: get_next_sequence_number(SeqNumServer) ->
 3120:     SeqNumServer ! {self(), get_next},
 3121:     receive {next_is, N} -> N end.
 3122: 
 3123: %% -----------------------------------------------------
 3124: %% Client part
 3125: %% Sends requests randomly parallel
 3126: 
 3127: run_clients(NumClients, ServerPort, SeqNumServer) ->
 3128:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 3129:     set_random_seed(),
 3130:     lists:map(
 3131:       fun(Id) ->
 3132: 	      Req = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("req~3..0w", [get_next_sequence_number(SeqNumServer)])),
 3133: 	      Url = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(ServerPort) ++  "/" ++ Req,
 3134: 	      Pid = proc_lib:spawn(
 3135: 		      fun() ->
 3136: 			      case httpc:request(Url) of
 3137: 				  {ok, {{_,200,_}, _, Resp}} ->
 3138: 				      ct:log("[~w] 200 response: "
 3139: 					       "~p~n", [Id, Resp]),
 3140: 				      case lists:prefix(Req++"->", Resp) of
 3141: 					  true -> exit(normal);
 3142: 					  false -> exit({bad_resp,Req,Resp})
 3143: 				      end;
 3144: 				  {ok, {{_,EC,Reason},_,Resp}}  ->
 3145: 				      ct:log("[~w] ~w response: "
 3146: 					       "~s~n~s~n",
 3147: 					       [Id, EC, Reason, Resp]),
 3148: 				      exit({bad_resp,Req,Resp});
 3149: 				  Crap ->
 3150: 				      ct:log("[~w] bad response: ~p",
 3151: 					       [Id, Crap]),
 3152: 				      exit({bad_resp, Req, Crap})
 3153: 			      end
 3154: 		      end),
 3155: 	      MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 3156: 	      timer:sleep(10 + rand:uniform(1334)),
 3157: 	      {Id, Pid, MRef}
 3158:       end,
 3159:       lists:seq(1, NumClients)).
 3160: 
 3161: wait4clients([], _Timeout) ->
 3162:     ok;
 3163: wait4clients(Clients, Timeout) when Timeout > 0 ->
 3164:     Time = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 3165: 
 3166:     receive
 3167: 	{'DOWN', _MRef, process, Pid, normal} ->
 3168: 	    {value, {Id, _, _}} = lists:keysearch(Pid, 2, Clients),
 3169: 	    NewClients = lists:keydelete(Id, 1, Clients),
 3170: 	    wait4clients(NewClients, Timeout - inets_lib:millisec_passed(Time));
 3171: 	{'DOWN', _MRef, process, Pid, Reason} ->
 3172: 	    {value, {Id, _, _}} = lists:keysearch(Pid, 2, Clients),
 3173: 	    ct:fail({bad_client_termination, Id, Reason})
 3174:     after Timeout ->
 3175: 	    ct:fail({client_timeout, Clients})
 3176:     end;
 3177: wait4clients(Clients, _) ->
 3178:     ct:fail({client_timeout, Clients}).
 3179: 
 3180: 
 3181: %% -----------------------------------------------------
 3182: %% Webserver part:
 3183: %% Implements a web server that sends responses one character
 3184: %% at a time, with random delays between the characters.
 3185: 
 3186: start_slow_server(SeqNumServer) ->
 3187:     proc_lib:start(
 3188:       erlang, apply, [fun() -> init_slow_server(SeqNumServer) end, []]).
 3189: 
 3190: init_slow_server(SeqNumServer) ->
 3191:     Inet = inet_version(),
 3192:     {ok, LSock} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [binary, Inet, {packet,0}, {active,true},
 3193: 				     {backlog, 100}]),
 3194:     {ok, {_IP, Port}} = inet:sockname(LSock),
 3195:     proc_lib:init_ack({ok, self(), Port}),
 3196:     loop_slow_server(LSock, SeqNumServer).
 3197: 
 3198: loop_slow_server(LSock, SeqNumServer) ->
 3199:     Master = self(),
 3200:     Acceptor = proc_lib:spawn(
 3201: 		 fun() -> client_handler(Master, LSock, SeqNumServer) end),
 3202:     receive
 3203: 	{accepted, Acceptor} ->
 3204: 	    loop_slow_server(LSock, SeqNumServer);
 3205: 	shutdown ->
 3206: 	    gen_tcp:close(LSock),
 3207: 	    exit(Acceptor, kill)
 3208:     end.
 3209: 
 3210: 
 3211: %% Handle one client connection
 3212: client_handler(Master, LSock, SeqNumServer) ->
 3213:     {ok, CSock} = gen_tcp:accept(LSock),
 3214:     Master ! {accepted, self()},
 3215:     set_random_seed(),
 3216:     loop_client(1, CSock, SeqNumServer).
 3217: 
 3218: loop_client(N, CSock, SeqNumServer) ->
 3219:     %% Await request, don't bother parsing it too much,
 3220:     %% assuming the entire request arrives in one packet.
 3221:     receive
 3222: 	{tcp, CSock, Req} ->
 3223: 	    ReqNum = parse_req_num(Req),
 3224: 	    RespSeqNum = get_next_sequence_number(SeqNumServer),
 3225: 	    Response = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~s->resp~3..0w/~2..0w", [ReqNum, RespSeqNum, N])),
 3226: 	    Txt = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("Slow server (~p) got ~p, answering with ~p",
 3227: 					      [self(), Req, Response])),
 3228: 	    ct:log("~s...~n", [Txt]),
 3229: 	    slowly_send_response(CSock, Response),
 3230: 	    case parse_connection_type(Req) of
 3231: 		keep_alive ->
 3232: 		    ct:log("~s...done~n", [Txt]),
 3233: 		    loop_client(N+1, CSock, SeqNumServer);
 3234: 		close ->
 3235: 		    ct:log("~s...done (closing)~n", [Txt]),
 3236: 		    gen_tcp:close(CSock)
 3237: 	    end
 3238:     end.
 3239: 
 3240: slowly_send_response(CSock, Answer) ->
 3241:     Response =  lists:flatten(io_lib:format("HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\nContent-Length: ~w\r\n\r\n~s",
 3242: 					    [length(Answer), Answer])),
 3243:     lists:foreach(
 3244:       fun(Char) ->
 3245: 	      timer:sleep(rand:uniform(500)),
 3246: 	      gen_tcp:send(CSock, <<Char>>)
 3247:       end,
 3248:       Response).
 3249: 
 3250: parse_req_num(Request) ->
 3251:     Opts = [caseless,{capture,all_but_first,list}],
 3252:     {match, [ReqNum]} = re:run(Request, "GET /(.*) HTTP", Opts),
 3253:     ReqNum.
 3254: 
 3255: parse_connection_type(Request) ->
 3256:     Opts = [caseless,{capture,all_but_first,list}],
 3257:     {match,[CType]} = re:run(Request, "connection: *(keep-alive|close)", Opts),
 3258:     case string:to_lower(CType) of
 3259: 	"close" -> close;
 3260: 	"keep-alive" -> keep_alive
 3261:     end.
 3262: 
 3263: set_random_seed() ->
 3264:     Unique = erlang:unique_integer(),
 3265:     A = erlang:phash2([make_ref(), self(), Unique]),
 3266:     rand:seed(exsplus, {A, A, A}).
 3267: 
 3268: 
 3269: otp_8739(doc) ->
 3270:     ["OTP-8739"];
 3271: otp_8739(suite) ->
 3272:     [];
 3273: otp_8739(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3274:     {_DummyServerPid, Port} = otp_8739_dummy_server(),
 3275:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 3276:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/dummy.html",
 3277:     Method      = get,
 3278:     Request     = {URL, []},
 3279:     HttpOptions = [{connect_timeout, 500}, {timeout, 1}],
 3280:     Options     = [{sync, true}],
 3281:     Profile     = ?profile(Config),
 3282:     case httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOptions, Options, Profile) of
 3283: 	{error, timeout} ->
 3284: 	    %% And now we check the size of the handler db
 3285: 	    Info = httpc:info(),
 3286: 	    ct:log("Info: ~p", [Info]),
 3287: 	    {value, {handlers, Handlers}} =
 3288: 		lists:keysearch(handlers, 1, Info),
 3289: 	    case Handlers of
 3290: 		[] ->
 3291: 		    ok;
 3292: 		_ ->
 3293: 		    ct:fail({unexpected_handlers, Handlers})
 3294: 	    end;
 3295: 	Unexpected ->
 3296: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, Unexpected})
 3297:     end.
 3298: 
 3299: otp_8739_dummy_server() ->
 3300:     Parent = self(),
 3301:     Pid = spawn_link(fun() -> otp_8739_dummy_server_init(Parent) end),
 3302:     receive
 3303: 	{port, Port} ->
 3304: 	    {Pid, Port}
 3305:     end.
 3306: 
 3307: otp_8739_dummy_server_init(Parent) ->
 3308:     Inet = inet_version(),
 3309:     {ok, ListenSocket} =
 3310: 	gen_tcp:listen(0, [binary, Inet, {packet, 0},
 3311: 			   {reuseaddr,true},
 3312: 			   {active, false}]),
 3313:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(ListenSocket),
 3314:     Parent ! {port, Port},
 3315:     otp_8739_dummy_server_main(Parent, ListenSocket).
 3316: 
 3317: otp_8739_dummy_server_main(_Parent, ListenSocket) ->
 3318:     case gen_tcp:accept(ListenSocket) of
 3319: 	{ok, Sock} ->
 3320: 	    %% Ignore the request, and simply wait for the socket to close
 3321: 	    receive
 3322: 		{tcp_closed, Sock} ->
 3323: 		    (catch gen_tcp:close(ListenSocket)),
 3324: 		    exit(normal);
 3325: 		{tcp_error, Sock, Reason} ->
 3326: 		    ct:fail("socket error: ~p", [Reason]),
 3327: 		    (catch gen_tcp:close(ListenSocket)),
 3328: 		    exit(normal)
 3329: 	    after 10000 ->
 3330: 		    %% Just in case
 3331: 		    (catch gen_tcp:close(Sock)),
 3332: 		    (catch gen_tcp:close(ListenSocket)),
 3333: 		    exit(timeout)
 3334: 	    end;
 3335: 	Error ->
 3336: 	    exit(Error)
 3337:     end.
 3338: 
 3339: send_multipart_chunks(Socket) ->
 3340:     send(Socket, http_chunk:encode("--chunk_boundary\r\n")),
 3341:     send(Socket, http_chunk:encode("Content-Type: text/plain\r\nContent-Length: 4\r\n\r\n")),
 3342:     send(Socket, http_chunk:encode("test\r\n")),
 3343:     ct:sleep(500),
 3344:     send_multipart_chunks(Socket).
 3345: 
 3346: receive_stream_n(_, 0) ->
 3347:     ok;
 3348: receive_stream_n(Ref, N) ->
 3349:     receive
 3350: 	{http, {Ref, stream_start, _}} ->
 3351: 	    receive_stream_n(Ref, N);
 3352: 	{http, {Ref,stream, Data}} ->
 3353: 	    ct:log("Data:  ~p", [Data]),
 3354: 	    receive_stream_n(Ref, N-1)
 3355:     end.
 3356: 
 3357: is_ipv6_supported() ->
 3358:     {ok, Hostname0} = inet:gethostname(),
 3359:     try 
 3360:         lists:member(list_to_atom(Hostname0), ct:get_config(ipv6_hosts))
 3361:     catch
 3362:          _: _ ->
 3363:             false
 3364:     end.
